text: Terrific looking black and silver tape measure. Locks automatically. Interesting rounded rubberized body with a thoughtful rubberized bottom so you don't scratch what you're measuring. Surprisingly lightweight, especially considering how robust the return spring strength is. Very comfortable to hold. Overall a very smart tape measure design, very impressive. The big belt clip on the back is a great idea, too. The nicest tape measure design I've seen in a long time.

After consulting with my teenage granola bar evaluation committee, this isn't much different than the other bars with chocolate and sea salt. Kind of crumbly, more like a  wafer than a granola bar. Nothing special about it that we noticed.

Impossibly strong fruit flavors, like tidal waves. And Heaven help you if you combine two or more flavors in the same handful. INSANELY strong flavors. I actually enjoyed the lemon/grapefruit flavors. Chewy, even moreso than caramel. You'lll give your jaws a workout. The other flavors I could identify included grapefruit, apple and cherry. ALL of them intensely strong, like nothing you've ever tasted before.The downside is that I'm expecting a terrible HFCS stomachache tomorrow morning about three. I hope it doesn't happen, but I'd be surprised if it didn't.Incredibly strong flavors. Totally irresistible.

Great tongs -- I noticed today that these are LARGER than the no-name tongs you may find at  your local market, and also the handles are larger, making them much easier to grasp and manipulate (I have large hands). These things are really great! Ideally sized, somebody's figured out what tongs need to be like to work best, and these would be the results!

Clever and substantial pop-up box made of heavy cardboard covered with a textured plastic on the exterior. The interior is black. There are four metal bosses (?) on each of the bottom corners of the lid. The box I'm looking at is 10.5 x 10.5 x 5, which is fairly large, but not large enough to store piece of standard North American paper. They make other boxes that will hold letter and even legal size documents. Or they suggest you might use this as a reusable gift box. It does look nice and seems like it would last a long time. Not crushable. Tight fitting lid to keep dust out. These boxes can apparently be stacked. Clever storage solution, better than plastic, looks rather regal.

Very good training table tennis balls. Looking back at my purchases of Champion and Stiga three-star balls over the years, the seamless construction is definitely worth looking for, more predictable and repeatable trajectory and no funny bounces like table tennis balls with seams can sometimes produce.  These are apparently meant to be used with an "iPong" table tennis practice machine which I hadn't heard of up to today. We have a Kettler indoor table tennis set and use Stiga paddles. A decent table tennis ball makes an enormous difference, and these look pretty good. Very smooth surface, unusually so. Very nice orderly presentation in a wide, flat box with a plastic insert with dimples to hold each ball. We've purchased those 144-ball one-star practice balls in the past and they're just not worth playing with. These aren't particularly cheap, but you get what you pay for, and these are as good as any other three-star balls we've played with.

Delightful measuring spoons. Bright colors, nicely designed. The Metric measurements aren't a big deal to me -- do you realize only the United States, Liberia, and Myanmar *don't* use the Metric System? I read a review that said their measuring spoons MELTED in the dishwasher, so I think I'll be washing these by hand.

Easy to assemble, relatively lightweight. The only issues during assembly were some rather murky photographs (their small size didn't help much) and a stubborn piece of tape over a metal tab that cuts the string to length. Reasonably well balanced. I do not miss the feeble but large battery on my old B&D string trimmer! Cordless? Never again!I borrowed a new, long extension cord I'd purchased to use with a leaf blower, got that untangled and headed out to do battle with my newly-overseeded lawn, which was in need of a haircut. WHOA! Lots of power! This is not a cordless trimmer, and the amount of power tells you that right away. This GH900 easily decimated all the edges of my tiny lawn area and trimmed the shoots coming up from the older lawn. Fast and easy. You can make this into an edger by rotating the business end of the device. There's an amusing little WHEEL attached to the GH900 which I gather allows it to roll and trim along sidwalks or walkways.I was done in no time! I hope this thing holds up. It wasn't terribly expensive and it did a great job.

Beautiful pump containers full of six different fragrances, almond (sophisticated and subtle), blueberry parfait (sweet), cherry blossom (delightful), cherry pie (sweet smelling), mango ice cream (nice) and olive oil. The soap cleans well, the transparent bottles show off the bright colors. These are a lot of fun. I always like anything that I can use as leverage to get my kids to wash their hands, and these are terrific. One of those fun everyday things that you can enjoy inexpensively.
Very tiny refill for the very tiny Tombow Airpress pen. I'm pleased to have a refill because the pen is too nice to treat as a disposable object.

Title: Coyote's CutieSeries: Confessions of a Mail Order BrideDesignation: Book Three, Standalone Novella, NO CliffhangerGenre: BBW Paranormal RomanceAuthor: Kate KentReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: FIVE HEARTWARMING STARS *****Yowza!! Kate Kent has outdone herself - again! She's really kicked up the heat with Coyote's Cutie, the third novella in her heartwarming new series, Confessions of a Mail Order Bride and it's quite the  sweet treat! The story is delightfully cute, deliciously sweet, completely unique and oh so romantic! The narrative is well written in the first person from our heroine's point of view which stands to reason since this series is entitled Confessions of a Mail Order Bride. The dialogue is smart, well executed and flows effortlessly. And as are all Kate's books, it is well developed, well crafted and well edited. Of course, my favorite part of all Kate's stories is a toss up between the sexy, engaging characters and the special worlds she always creates for us. And in this series, we get a brand new town, Shifter Villages which is filled with special hangouts and a variety of hunky, handsome shifters! Hubba! Hubba! So, I feel sure she'll have several that will tickle your fancy! Buckle up my lovelies! Let's go visit Shifter Villages!Marcie Shore has never had an easy life. Her mother died when she was only six and as a result her father became a bitter, violent alcoholic. At sixteen, she quit school and ran away from home. It's a dangerous world for a teenage girl but the first traveler to offer her a ride was a shifter who thankfully gave her a lift to Shifter Villages, a community of shape shifters where she decided to put down roots, at least for a while. She desperately needed a job so she could save enough money to buy a car but who would hire a young woman without any experience and no education? Mel, owner of the Dixie Diner took a chance on Marcie and five years later, she's still unhappily stuck in Shifter Villages with a dead-end job living a lonely miserable life. Marcie's made a lot of mistakes and the greatest of those has been looking for love with all the wrong men in town which sadly, has earned her an unsavory reputation and the horrible nickname of 'Hardcore Shore'. And after her latest hookup with arrogant, conceited wolf shifter and real estate mogul Brad Stanford, there's no longer any chance of her finding love and happiness in the small town of Shifter Villages. Or is there??? It seems everyone else is signing up for the new Luscious Lads and Ladies Marriage Mates website created by bull-shifter Vic Harris, so why couldn't she give it a whirl? Nope, she can't take the chance of being the brunt of everyone's jokes but it seems fate has decided to step in and make the decision for her. Oh my! Will Marcie ever be able to find the love for which  she so desperately longs???Handsome coyote-shifter and owner of Kane's Bar and Grill, Kane Foster has had his eye on beautiful Marcie Shore for quite some time but has never had the courage to act - until now. Once he sees her "accidentally posted" profile on the Luscious Lads and Ladies Marriage Mates website, he knows it's time for him to act and an embarrassing situation provides him with the perfect opportunity! Oh my! Will Kane be able to convince the gun-shy Marcie that he truly cares for her and wants her for more than just her body??? Hmm...I wonder what will Marcie decide? Will she take a chance on love, or now that she no longer has a job, will she be forced to leave town for good??? But the bigger mystery is who seems to be causing all the devastating damage in Shifter Villages and why?  One person has been killed, another seriously injured and multiple businesses have been destroyed including the Dixie Diner. What will happen next and who will be targeted? Will the master manipulator and duplicitous Brad Stanford steal Marcie's last chance at happiness??? Will the selfish Brad ever get what's coming to him? Will Sheriff Dirk Matthews finally discover who is orchestrating all the fires and property damage in Shifter Villages? Will Deputy Bob ever leave poor Max Harris alone? We'll see! No spoilers from me but I will say this.....Young, beautiful human waitress who has a history of looking for love in all the wrong places with all the wrong people and has had more than her share of bad luck-check! Sexy, kindhearted and successful coyote shifter who wants to take a chance on love-check! Selfish, conceited, untrustworthy wolf shifter-check! A cast of wonderful characters including a quite dextrous cat named Elvis-check! Another wedding, another fire and a very unexpected but quite satisfying turn of events-check! Heated attraction and sweet romance-you bet! That and a whole lot more! These books are all fast-paced, entertaining, standalone novellas with each featuring a different couple. I loved it but be forewarned, you better have your box of tissues handy - this one is a real tearjerker!Complimentary copy received in exchange for an honest review.

Title: Dead Reaper WalkingSeries: Liberty, OakwoodDesignation: Book Two of Series, Not a StandaloneGenre: Paranormal/Supernatural/Fantasy RomanceAuthor: Mina CarterMy Rating: FIVE SUPER SEXY STARS*****Oh my! Buttons over Biscuits! Talk about wild, hot and seriously sexy....this book has it all! This release is almost twice as long as the first book of the series, The Reaper and the Cop, and Mina has most definitely packed double the fun, action, adventure, romance and steamy sex into this riveting story. And I still loved every single page! Love action-packed adventure? It's included! Prefer something with a paranormal/supernatural kick? Yep, Mina has it covered. Can't live without a little mystery and suspense? You don't have to because it's here. Need great characters? You bet - the hero and the heroine both take charge, kick butt and take no prisoners. Like a generous measure of humor and snark sprinkled in? You got it. Gotta have fiery passion, steamy romance and dreamy sex? Oh, you better believe it's included! And, an extra plus, as is with all Mina's books, it's well crafted, well written and well edited. Although this book contains a good bit of backstory, I do not recommend it as a standalone, but rather a continuation so I do recommend reading Book One, The Reaper and the Cop, first. So far, this is only a two book series and does have a happy ending but Mina also sets the perfect stage for the introduction of more books in the future. Personally, I would love to see Laney and her new cop boyfriend, Troy Regan, continue their adventure together.Laney Larson is a total bada**, and she's a reaper. She even has a Grimm. Yep, it's the family business inherited from her great, great, great, great something grandfather and she's the lucky one chosen from her siblings to pick up the mantel and carry on the family tradition. She's totally got it covered and everything well in hand. At least she did until she cruises into the small backwoods town of Liberty, Oakwood on her sentient, almost-alive(sorta) ride which can change from a custom super bad motorcycle to whatever the heck she needs and meets smokin' hot police detective Troy Regan and now, all bets are off. He's sex on a stick and she wants him for a one night romp. There's a little problem with her scenario of how everything will play out however. He wants her too - like forever! Oh, and he doesn't know she's a reaper - at least not yet and she's only supposed to tell her one true love, at least according to her grandfather. What's a girl to do??? Why tell him, of course! Unfortunately for our two new lovers, there's serious trouble brewing in town and it's headed straight for them! And said trouble just captured her new man! Her job is not to save lives, she takes them - until now! Laney just got promoted from violent deaths to special operations! What the heck?! What's a reaper to do??? Go save her man, of course! Oh my! A reaper's work is never done! So many souls to claim but so little time! No spoilers from me but I will say this.....Handsome, hunky police detective-check! Beautiful, sexy Grimm Reaper who kicks butt, takes names and reaps souls-check! A cast of sexy characters-check! A hell gate and a demon from hell - literally! Action, adventure and suspense-check! Heated attraction, fiery passion and steamy, dreamy, hotter-than-haydees sex-you bet! That and a whole lot more! I loved it!

Wow! Like really WOW! Color me impressed! This is my first Kindle so I really had no idea what to expect but now that I have it, I'll never be without a Kindle. It goes with me everywhere I go. It's a tough little bugger because it's home is either in my purse or in my hand and it's still going strong even after a year! I have no qualms at all at recommending this product for people of all ages. It's reliable, easy to operate, navigate and it's perfect for people who like to read at home or on the go. It's perfect for browsing the web, checking your email, keeping up with your friends on Facebook and snapping photos on the go! And it's good for hours and hours of reading pleasure without having to recharge but when you do plug in, it charges quickly and efficiently. It's absolutely perfect and I love it! As a matter of fact, I'm so happy with my Kindle that today I saw the Kindle Fire HD 10 inch tablet and decided that I needed one of those as well. Thank you Amazon for such a wonderful product. I no longer have to carry a satchel of books everywhere I go!

When I ordered my new Kindle Fire HD, I knew that I wanted an exceptional screen covering to protect my investment. After doing much research on several of the products offered on Amazon, I decided on the Moshi iVisor Screen Protector. It was a little more expensive than the majority of the other products offered but believe me when I say, it was worth every single penny I spent. I've now had my Kindle Fire HD for a year with the same Moshi iVisor Screen Protector and it's still in perfect condition. As advertised, it fit perfectly and was easy to install and has NO BUBBLES! Once it's in place, you don't even notice it's there. It's the least obvious screen protector I've ever seen. It's durable and very simple to clean with only a damp cloth and it's right back to its original new condition. I love it so much that this year I'm giving a Kindle as a gift and I intend to add one of these screen protectors as well. There's only one little drawback to this product. Since it cuts down on the glare, it also dials back on the vivid colors of the HD display. Personally, I don't mind so much as long as I know my screen is protected. Hands gown, the best screen protector I've ever purchased! I totally love it and would not be without it!

Wow! I love my new Fintie Fire HD Case. I carry my Kindle with me everywhere I go so I knew I need a case that would be not only attractive but durable as well. Let's face it, the insude of a woman's handbag is not for the meek of heart and Fintie delivered in spades. I ordered the Leopard Brown and it's simply the cat's meow! People are always interrupting me while I'm reading, asking where did I purchase my adorable case and of course, I always tell them - it's a Fintie and I purchased it from Amazon. It holds my Kindle snugly and safely and also prevents damage if its ever accidentally dropped. I'm sure that's not part of their guarantee but I discovered this little fact first hand when mine took a tumble and lived to tell the tale! It's also durable, very comfortable to hold while reading and doesn't hinder the operation of the front or rear camera.. It's absolutely perfect! I couldn't be happier with my purchase and fully intend to purchase more of these cases for my other devices. I think that's the best compliment I can give.

Title: A Hero of RealmsSeries: A Shade of VampireDesignation: Book Twenty of a Multi-Novel series, NOT a Standalone ReadAuthor: Bella ForrestGenre: Young Adult Paranormal RomanceReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: FIVE MAGNIFICENT STARS *****Wow! Best-selling author Bella Forrest has dazzled her readers yet again with A Hero of Realms, the twentieth release in her spellbinding mega-hit series, A Shade of Vampire and she has totally left me breathless- again! Like thousands of my fellow Shaddicts, I've been hooked from the very first book of the series and now anxiously await each release. I simply can't get enough! I was turning the pages so fast, my Kindle Fire couldn't keep up! Just when I think there's no way this series can get any better - wham - Bella hits us with another knockout! Bella has surprised us all with another riveting adventure that curls our toes, makes our hearts pound and keeps us begging for more! This is a paranormal/supernatural/fantasy/adventure saga so unlike any other I've ever read. It is exciting, well crafted, original, unique, imaginative, thrilling, fast paced, riveting, action packed, mysterious, suspenseful, enchanting, heartbreaking, heartwarming, seductive and oh so romantic. Whew, what a mouthful, but these are only a few of the words that come to mind after reading this incredible chronicle of the Shade, its inhabitants and its enemies. Can you tell that I really love this story? The narrative is exceptionally well written in the first person with a multitude of alternating points of view. Each chapter is told by one of the characters which I feel gives so much more depth, intensity and perspective to the story and adds to the complexity and understanding of the characters. The dialogue is smart, exceptionally well executed, well edited and flows effortlessly. Although the story is compelling and the dialogue is exceptional, it's truly the magnificent, comprehensive cast of larger than life characters that makes the biggest impact. They are well developed, captivating, intriguing, engaging, endearing and quite literally, out of this world sexy! They explode from the page, grab your imagination, capture your heart and hold you totally enthralled from beginning to end. Forrest skillfully combines these elements to craft a stunningly brilliant masterpiece of paranormal romance filled to the brim with action, adventure, fantasy, mystery, suspense, magic, supernatural beings, love, passion, loyalty, heartbreak, hope and plot twists that will blow your mind.In Book Twenty, our story resumes with Ben Novak now back at the Oasis after pledging himself to Oueen Nuriya of the Nasiri Jinn and true mistress of the Oasis in exchange for freeing his friends and family of The Shade who were being held as prisoners. Rather than join her family, River has chosen to remain with Ben and our two unlikely heroes have finally professed their love for the other, but the Prince of the Shade refuses to allow River to sacrifice her life for him. After learning in Book Nineteen from the Oracle that the evil Elder, Basilius, imprinted upon him as an infant while being held captive by the Hawks, Ben is now convinced that he must seek to rid himself of this curse alone. Despite River's objections, Ben convinces Corrine, who was left behind as a prisoner at the Oasis, to transport River back to the Shade without her consent while she was asleep. Despite Ben's determination to make his journey alone, he finds that he must unfortunately rely on the aid of the Jinn, a Hawk and a newly acquainted vampire to join him in his quest to free not only himself from Basilius but to also save both the human and supernatural realms from the ominous threat of the resurrection and return to power of the malevolent Elders. Tragically, Ben learns too late that some enemies as well as friends should never be trusted. As predicted, Ben finds himself at a fork with the weight of worlds upon his shoulders, where he must choose to become a soldier of shadows and destroyer of worlds, or a hero of realms. Oh my! New characters are introduced and more pieces to the puzzle are slowly revealed only to be replaced by even more perplexing questions. Will Ben discover the answers he so desperately needs before it's too late??? Will Ben ever be able to free himself from the life with which he has now been cursed to live??? Will Jeramiah finally be able to exact his revenge??? We'll see!!! No spoilers from me but I will say this......Handsome, guilt-stricken, newly turned vampire who can't control his bloodlust-check! Beautiful half-blood heroine who gets caught up in what she once thought to be only fantasy and fairy tales-check! A plethora of supernatural characters including vampires, werewolves, witches, dragons, harpys, ogres, hawks, jinn, mermaids, mermen and even a hellhound-you bet! Danger, drama, adventure, suspense, mind blowing plot twists, an unexpected betrayal, an old enemy returns and a dangerous new enemy emerges-you bet! A confession of love between Ben and River-oh yes!!! That and a whole lot more! I love it! I never tire of visiting my friends of 'The Shade'. It always feels like returning home. If you love heart-wrenching young adult paranormal romance, heartbreaking angst, tantalizing magic, out of this world fantasy, spine-tingling suspense, hold your breath action, malevolent enemies, evil machinations, unexpected plot twists and heart-pounding adventure, then you will surely enjoy A Shade of Vampire series. Buckle up my lovelies! It's another wild, wonderful and thrilling ride! Please keep in mind, this is a series - not a stand alone story and the books should be read in order of their release - and it does contain nail biting cliffhangers that will leave you on the edge of your seat panting for more - which I love! Bella always keeps us on our toes but lovingly rewards our patience with each new release. Well done, Bella, very well done! I can hardly wait to read what happens next with Derek, Sophia, Caleb, Rose, Ben, River, Claudia, Yuri, Vivienne, Xavier, Aiden, Corrine, Ibrahim and all the other wonderful residents of the Shade when Ben's adventure continues in Book 21! And a few of our old favorites from the early books even make a return! Charmingly captivating, seriously sexy, powerfully compelling and delightfully entertaining!!!My Rating: FIVE DIVINELY ENTERTAINING STARS *****

Title: The Reaper and the CopSeries: Liberty, OakwoodDesignation: Book One of Series, Includes a Happy-For-NowAuthor: Mina CarterMy Rating: FIVE CAPTIVATING STARS*****Oh my! Buttons over Biscuits! Talk about wild, hot and seriously sexy....this book has it all! Mina Carter has packed a heck of a lot of punch into this small package and I loved every single page! Love action-packed adventure? It's included! Prefer something with a paranormal/supernatural kick? Yep, Mina has it covered. Can't live without a little mystery and suspense? You don't have to because it's here. Need great characters? You bet - the hero and the heroine both take charge, kick butt and take no prisoners. Like a generous measure of humor and snark sprinkled in? You got it. Although this book can be read as a standalone, it is the first in a (so far) two book series and does end in what I would call a happy-for-now. And there is already a second book available entitled Dead Reaper Walking which I fully intend to purchase and read.Laney Larson is a total bada**, and she's a reaper. Yep, it's the family business and she's the lucky one chosen from her siblings to pick up the mantel and carry on the family tradition. She's totally got it covered and everything well in hand until she cruises into the small backwoods town of Liberty, Oakwood and meets smokin' hot police detective Troy Regan and all bets are off. He's sex on a stick and she wants him for a one night romp. There's a little problem with her scenario of how everything will play out however. He wants her too - like forever! Oh, and he doesn't know she's a reaper - at least not yet! Unfortunately for our two lovers, there's serious trouble brewing in town and it's headed straight for them! So many souls to claim but so little time! No spoilers from me but I will say this.....Handsome, hunky police detective-check! Beautiful, sexy Grimm Reaper who kicks butt, takes names and reaps souls-check! Action, adventure and suspense-check! Heated attraction, fiery passion and steamy, dreamy sex-you bet! That and a whole lot more! I loved it!

Title: Bump in the NightSeries: Deadly WhispersDesignation: Book One, Standalone, No CliffhangerAuthor: Elianne AdamsMy Rating: FIVE DELIGHTFULLY ENTERTAINING STARS*******This story was originally published as part of the Dark Hallows Anthology which is where I read it.This was totally different than anything I've read from Adams. It was so not what I expected but so much more than I imagined. It's listed as the first book in her Deadly Whispers Series and I certainly hope this is true because I would love to read more about this couple and the world Adams has created for them. I fell in love with this couple and their storyline. The narrative was written in the third person with his and her points of view from our female and male protagonists, Libbie McMaster and Jay Connors. Libbie is not only a witch but also a daemon although not a pure blood.(And I had to look that one up and found out a daemon is the equivalent of a demi-god or benevolent demon/fallen angel and very powerful. Wow! Who knew?) And yes, Libbie works for the good guys and her boss, Jordan, is an angel. Our handsome hero, Jay, is a good old fashioned werewolf who can shift into not only his wolf but also the werewolf war form - you know, the really big scary wolf-like creature that walks upright. Yeah, that's the one. Our two lovers are introduced and set up by Libbie's best friend, April, and meet for the first time at a bar called The Witch's Brew. Libbie has placed herself into a self imposed time-out because she failed to rescue an innocent and it has haunted her ever since - until she meets Jay on her first night out with her friend in nine months. Their attraction and chemistry is red hot! I loved it! This is a standalone story that moves at a brisk but comfortable pace and does have a happy ending.

Title: Dark HallowsAuthors: Multiple AuthorsDesignation: Collection of Nine Short StoriesReading Platform: Kindle EditionMy Rating: FIVE CAPTIVATING STARS*****Dark Hallows is a diverse and captivating collection of haunting tales from nine very talented writers. Okay, it's no secret that I'm an Ellis Leigh and Elianne Adams fan and in all honesty, I purchased this anthology to read their contributions to the set but I must say, I also enjoyed several of the other stories as well. Let's face it, where else can you buy this many stories for a buck so even if I only enjoy a few of the stories, I figure it's always a win-win for me. But I have to be honest, there were quite a few of the other stories I also enjoyed and even discovered several new authors to add to my favorites list like Deanna Chase and Annie Nicholas, like WOW - where in the world have they been and how the heck have I missed them until now??? So far, I've read four of the stories and loved them all. They are well crafted, well written and well edited with intriguing stories and engaging characters that will capture your heart and your imagination.1) Bump in the Night by Elianne Adams: 5 Stars*****Series: Deadly Whispers, Book OneThis was totally different than anything I've read from Adams. It was so not what I expected but so much more than I imagined. It's listed as the first book in her Deadly Whispers Series and I certainly hope this is true because I would love to read more about this couple and the world she has created for them. I fell in love with this couple and their storyline. The narrative was written in the third person with his and her points of view from our female and male protagonists, Libbie McMaster and Jay Connors. Libbie is not only a witch but also a daemon although not a pure blood.(And I had to look that one up and found out a daemon is the equivalent of a demi-god or benevolent demon/fallen angel and very powerful. Wow! Who knew?) And yes, Libbie works for the good guys and her boss is an angel. Our handsome hero, Jay, is a good old fashioned werewolf who can shift into not only his wolf but also the werewolf war form - you know, the really big scary wolf-like creature that walks upright. Yeah, that's the one. They're introduced and set up by her best friend, April, and meet for the first time at a bar called The Witch's Brew. Libbie has placed herself into a self imposed time out because she failed to rescue an innocent and it has haunted her ever since - until she meets Jay on her first night out with her friend in nine months. Their attraction and chemistry is red hot! I loved it! This is a standalone story that moves at a brisk but comfortable pace and does have a happy ending.4) Ravenous by Annie Nicholas: Five Stars*****Series: Lake City Stories, Book OneThis is the first book in Nicholas' Lake City Stories Series and is not a new story. Although I would consider this to be a "somewhat" standalone, it is the beginning of a continuing series and this book does end in only a happy-for-now with the promise of much more to come for our female protagonist, young fledgling succubus, Pia Marie Blyton. I was totally mesmerized by this story and its characters which also includes all manner of supernatural creatures along with a charismatic ancient vampire named Zur-Sin. The story is well crafted, well written and well edited. The narrative is written in the first person as told by Pia. This is one sexy read! I loved it! I'm so glad I found you Annie Nicholas!6) Marked by Temptation by Deanna Chase: Five Stars*****Series: Coven Pointe Series, Book OneJackpot! Where have you been hiding Deanna Chase??? Wow! Another new author to add to my favorites list! I loved this story! It's imaginative, seductive, well crafted, well written and well edited. The dialogue is smart, sexy and flows effortlessly. The narrative is written in the first person with alternating his and her points of view from the two protagonists of the story and believe me when I say, they are absolutely yummy! Beautiful Matisse Ballintine is a sex witch and must have sex in order to replenish her power. She's one of the good guys and in addition to being a college student, she also works for her sister who is head of the Angel Council. Yep, she's a busy girl and always on the lookout for her next victim..umm...willing sex partner. Or she was until she met handsome bounty hunter Vaughn Paxton who also comes from a magical family. Oh my! Sparks fly! Quite literally! The attraction and chemistry between these two is red hot! Does Vaughn have any magical abilities? Well, that's the million dollar question, isn't it? I'll never tell! I will certainly be reading more from Deanna Chase!7) Masterson by Ellis Leigh: Five Stars*****Yowza! What a character! Masterson is a very old vampire who was sired by the Master. Get it? He's the Master's son so he's Masterson. And he is one sexy, dominant vampire! Swoon....This story really surprised me and it was a very pleasant surprise. I'm a diehard Ellis Leigh fan but this was so different than anything I've ever read by Ellis but I LOVED it! This story is well crafted, well written and well edited. The narrative is written in the first person as told by none other than Masterson and each chapter is a day of the week with the entire story unfolding in seven days. The dialogue is smart and effortless. It's bloody brilliant and Masterson is a work of art. He's one scary, creepy dude and I couldn't get enough of him. This story is rich, dark and intense so be forewarned, it's not for the weak of heart. But never fear, it seems that even devilishly devious vampires can fall for the right person, especially if it's the one for whom he's been searching for hundreds of years. And wouldn't you just know it, she just happens to be a necromancer and a medical examiner, and she secretly knows what he is and does lead him on a merry chase. Yep, Masterson has it bad for Dr Vale Theroux or 'Plum' as he likes to call her. Oh my! This is one sinfully seductive read and I loved every minute of it! Another fabulous read Ellis Leigh!Okay, that's all I've read so far but I'm about to start on Ghost-Ordered Bride by Sadie Haller and More Than A Feeling by Cate Dean, two more first time authors for me.

Title: MiriSeries: Plenty of ShiftDesignation: Book One, Standalone Novella, No CliffhangerAuthor: Carina WilderReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: FIVE SUPER SEXY STARS*****Wow! I'm totally smitten with Carina Wilder's new series, Plenty of Shift. The story is cute, sweet, fun, humorous, totally unique and so romantic. It is also well crafted, well written in the third person and absolutely adorable. The dialogue is smart, sexy and flows effortlessly. The characters are captivating, engaging and endearing. I am so in love with Miri, the female protagonist of this story. Miri is a cougar and owner of her very own brand new business venture, Plenty of Shift, a matchmaking agency. No, not that type of cougar - shame on you! She's a real live cougar-shifter and her new agency is for shifters! I love it! As a result of a very lecherous boss, Miri is more than ready to leave her old job behind along with her old life and apartment which included a cheating human boyfriend, or rather, now ex-boyfriend. Miri has always been quite successful in matching up her friends with the perfect guy. Unfortunately, she can't say the same for her own relationships which always seem to end in heartache. So when her best friend, Jenn, suggests she start her own business and match people professionally, Miri is all in but when Jenn wants to return the matchmaking favor and introduces Miri to bear-shifter, Malcolm Byrne, the bartender at The Fox and Hound Bar, aka The Bear Bar, she's more than a little reluctant to act on the instant attraction she feels for the handsome, hunky bear. Besides, she refuses to break her own rule of dating only humans because her mother taught her that shifter males are all violent and cheating players but....he is awfully sexy and so very hot...and he seems to be attracted to her as well. So, what's a girl kitty to do? Will Miri be able to get her new business off the ground and take a chance on love for herself with a sexy bear-shifter??? Will Miri be successful in matching her very first client who turns out to be her new landlord and new friend, Naomi? We'll see! Miri plans to offer her clients a very unique opportunity and a choice? And we, Carina's readers will also have a choice because we get to choose who we want to match with Naomi or maybe we'll choose and read both. I love it! This is so new and different! I can hardly wait although I have to say, I'm really leaning toward Quinn - being made love to on a yacht in the Mediterranean certainly sounds fabulous! Great idea and great story! Fabulous entertainment and an awesome read!

Title: Thrilling WeeksSeries: Alpha Billionaire Romance SeriesDesignation: Book Nine of Multi-Installment Serial, NOT a StandaloneAuthor: Sarah J BrooksReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: FIVE DELIGHTFULLY ENTERTAINING STARS *****Love it! Thrilling Weeks is the ninth riveting installment of Sarah J Brooks' seductive new serial and I must say, I'm totally captivated. This is a serialized story so if you haven't read the previous books in the series, PLEASE STOP HERE. Okay, I realize that multi-installment serials may not be for everyone but what can I say, I love them. And Sarah Brooks just got my attention! This is my first time reading anything written by Brooks but I can say with absolute certainty, it won't be my last. I am so hooked on this author and this series! I love the concept of this story:  a strong female lead with BRAINS. She's not only beautiful but intelligent as well and the icing on the cake: she has a mind of her own except when it comes to love, and who of us has not been blinded by love at least once in our life. I know I have! Of course, we all love a handsome alpha male lead and love them all the more when they're sexy, charming and intelligent. And let's not forget - filthy rich! Who can resist that combination??? The story is exciting, sensual, arousing, well crafted, suspenseful and completely grabbed and held my attention. Once I started reading, it was easy to immerse myself in the story and I wanted more. The narrative is exceptionally well written in the first person with his, his and her points of view, which I love. Yep, I said his twice and that wasn't a mistake. There are now two men weighing in with their take on the events as they happen. That's all I can say without giving too much away but what I can say is this - I love it! I believe this adds to the depth and complexity of the story and definitely gives us a better understanding of the characters, their feelings and motivations. The dialogue is smart, snappy, easy to follow and flows effortlessly. And now for the best part, the characters. They are fascinating, captivating, intriguing, engaging and relatable. The chemistry between the three main characters is convincing and at times, quite perplexing but in a good way. Quite simply, it is off the charts sexy and thrilling! Brooks skillfully crafts these elements into a fabulously entertaining contemporary romance  with a twist. What kind of twist, you ask? Well, it's a little too early to tell but I strongly suspect that we will have a little mystery, suspense and betrayal as the story progresses. (And we most certainly do!) And please forgive me for being crass, but we didn't have to wait until halfway through the book for the mind-blowing sex! Oh no, Brooks rewarded us in the very first installment and gave us a little taste of how well suited these characters are for each other. I can hardly wait to read the next installment!Beautiful graduate student Becka Jasper is definitely on her way to a very promising and successful career. She's had to work hard for everything she has and intends to work even harder to get what she wants. When Oliver Weeks, CEO of Neuotova is invited to speak as a guest lecturer by Dr Evans, Becka's professor/advisor/mentor, she is able to snag an interview for an internship with Oliver Weeks, CEO of Neuotova, a major food research corporation. But Becka is immediately thrown off her game when she first sets eyes on Oliver Weeks and is more than just a little attracted to him. She immediately feels the chemistry between them and is conflicted over her decision to seek a job with the handsome, charismatic CEO. And it seems Oliver Weeks may be attracted to her as well.  Oh my!Billionaire Oliver Weeks has worked long and hard to achieve his success. The only area in which he hasn't been successful is his personal life. He works hard but plays little and very seldom has time for a relationship with the fairer sex. Most of his dates are arranged by his personal assistant and never the same woman. He has no interest in love or developing feelings for anyone - until now. One look at Becka Jasper is all it takes for alpha male Oliver to know that he wants her and not just as an intern in his lab. She's not only beautiful but she's also brilliant. He wants her in his life as well as his bed and he's not accustomed to being told no. Oliver Weeks always gets what he wants and he wants Becka. Oh my! Will Oliver be able to convince Becka to accept his offer - both of them??? Hmm...I wonder???Book Two:Becka has accepted Oliver's requests for several dates and their chemistry is off the charts but she's still conflicted over accepting an internship with his company while having a personal relationship with the handsome CEO. She has little time to consider her dilemma when she's broadsided with some devastating news. Becka and Dr Evans have spent countless time and much effort on a special research project for Protame, a healthy replacement for the artificial sweetener Aspartame. Becka has worked tirelessly on this project and has also chosen it as the subject as her dissertation. The university has suffered budget cutbacks and as a result, they have lost funding for their project. Oh no! What will she do? Maybe she should tell Oliver. Will Oliver be able to help??? Oliver is more determined than ever to have the beautiful Becka in his bed and in his lab. And he's not above a little scheming and manipulation to get what he wants. But let's not forget, Becka has a mind of her own and may have a few surprises in store for the wealthy determined billionaire! It's a battle of wills and both are determined to get what they want but will it be each other??? Or are there other secrets and motivations at play? Hmm... I wonder???Book Three:Oliver weeks did indeed help the lovely Becka and donated the money anonymously to the University to fund her Protame project and of course he has his own selfish reasons. He wants Becka and if that means making her feel somewhat indebted to him, then so be it. He's certainly not above using every dirty trick in the book to get what he wants but he certainly never expected her proclamation of never mixing business with pleasure. She's refused to sleep with him if she accepts the position at Neuotova! Huh? Oh yes, she definitely laid the law down to him. But when had he ever allowed a little thing like an emphatic no to ever stop him from getting what he wants? Never! He'll do whatever it takes; he's determined to have the beautiful, intelligent Becka?Becka knows it was Oliver that donated the money but does finally agrees to accept the internship with Neuotova, but she has a caveat of her own. If she accepts the internship as a paid position, she will be unable continue her personal relationship with Oliver. What? Nope, her conscience won't allow it. She will not allow a personal relationship to compromise her work ethics. Or will she? While doing some research on Oliver and his company, Becka uncovers some very disturbing allegations against Oliver and his company Neuotova, allegations charging animal cruelty by the use use of animals in their research, experimentation and testing. Huh? Becka is a researcher after all so who better to investigate? Becka is invited by her advisor Dr Evans to teach a Food Science Ethics class and at her very first class she meets student Ethan Hernandez who makes some serious charges regarding the use of animal testing against Neuotova. But are they true or simply conjecture and who is Ethan Hernandez? There's only one way to discover the truth and if it means more research into company files, then that's a chance she's willing to take. She just hadn't expected a perfect opportunity to fall into her lap when Oliver offers her a job as his assistant and a two week working vacation to Italy. Huh? Oh my! Can she work so closely with him and still be objective? I think not!Book Four:Apparently, Becka can't remain objective, not when Oliver insists on whisking her away to Italy for a working vacation with lots of shopping, romantic dinners and lots and lots of dreamy sex. Oh my! But nothing can last forever and so they must return home to their lives which for Becka includes discovering the truth about Oliver. Becka has received an email from Ethan promising absolute proof of his accusations against Oliver. Becka  reveals this information to Oliver but she now must decide whether to meet with Ethan. But Ethan has decided to turn up the heat, not only in his effort to turn Becka against Oliver but also to pursue her for himself as well. What? Becka is now caught in the middle of the two powerful men and has no idea which one to believe. And the latest revelation from Oliver about Ethan has her even more confused! Talk about dropping a bomb! Oh my glory! I never saw that one coming! So, what's a girl to do when two handsome, wealthy men are both supposedly vying for her affection? Sleep with one and kiss the other??? Oh my!Book Five:After agreeing to a meeting with Ethan and sharing a mind-blowing kiss with him, Becka comes to the sudden realization that she's actually attracted to both handsome men but how is that even possible? How can she be attracted to both Oliver and Ethan when obviously one of the men is lying to her? But who is lying and who is telling the truth? If she's to believe the documents Ethan has shown her, then Oliver is paying Ethan to guarantee his silence, therefore Oliver is not being honest. Or Ethan is blackmailing Oliver and extorting money but for what reason? Documents can be forged, right? Oliver has become an important part of her life but just what is her relationship with him? Does he truly care about her and her welfare? Is she is his girlfriend or merely flavor of the month? And to further complicate the situation, it now seems that Ethan wants Becka for himself and intends to steal her away from Oliver. Oh my! Ethan doesn't give Becka long to contemplate her questions. The morning after their impromptu kiss, Ethan unexpectedly arrives at Neuotova demanding to see Oliver and then..... immediately envelops her in his arms and crushes her with a hot smoldering kiss just as Oliver is opening his office door! OMG! Oliver goes ballistic and Ethan retaliates. Allegations, threats and insults are hurled by each and it seems they may come to blows. What a nightmare! (Or is it? Hmm...What woman doesn't want two hot as heck billionaires fighting over her? But is it really her they're fighting over?) Apparently both men have been less than forthright with Becka. Each has lied to her and kept a shocking secret. But Oliver just let the cat out of the bag! Oh my goodness! Oliver is determined to keep Becka no matter the cost but that Ethan is such a devilishly naughty boy! After all, what's a little deceit, betrayal, blackmail and extortion among ......I'll still never tell!Book Six:After discovering the secret of Oliver and Ethan's relationship, Becka is determined to leave her troubles behind, at least for the weekend. She needs time to think and that means time away from both Oliver and Ethan. She and Lisa, her best friend and roommate, take a break to have a little fun but Becka's merrymaking is constantly interrupted by thoughts of Oliver. After a wild night partying, Becka tries to contact Oliver but his phone is answered by none other than Ethan! Ethan? Oh my goodness! And when Becka demands to know what's going on, Ethan refuses to explain, insisting that if she wants to know, she must immediately come to Oliver's home. What the heck? Why is Ethan at Oliver's home and where is Oliver?Book Seven:Ethan is in full seduction mode and plans to have Becka in his arms and in his bed. Well, actually it would be Oliver's bed since it's in his house but at this point, he doesn't really care. Oliver's not here but he is and he wants Becka. He's never wanted a woman so much in his entire life. So what if he had to tell a little lie to get her here! All's fair in love and war!Becka finds herself succumbing to Ethan's charm but who could blame her? He's smokin' hot and for some reason, she feels inexplicably drawn to both men. Oliver has disappeared again without even a goodbye much less an explanation so why should she feel guilty about being with Ethan in Oliver's home? Maybe she's misjudged Ethan after all or so she thinks until she finds blood in the wine cellar. It must be Oliver's blood. Is Oliver still alive and if so, where is he? Oh my! Surely Ethan would never harm Oliver, would he? After all, they are former business partners and ....... Nope, I'll still never tell! But I will say this....Ethan has certainly stepped up his game! But will Becka fall for it???Book Eight:Oliver is indeed, very much alive and makes a surprise appearance At Becka's apartment only to unexpectedly disappear - again. But this time, he may have gone too far and his actions may be unforgivable. Someone has stolen every single page of Becka's research on Neuotva, Oliver and Ethan and unfortunately, all the evidence points to Oliver as being the thief. And this time, his actions have not only jeopardized her career but also destroyed her entire life and future as well. With the media closing in on her after information from the stolen files is leaked to the press, Becka has now become the focus of their attention and just like before, Oliver has completely deserted her refusing to even answer her calls, yet again leaving her to fend for herself in an impossible situation. More secrets and lies are revealed as the suspense continues to build! Who should Becka trust???Book Nine:Becka has lost everything because of Oliver and Ethan. She has been suspended from school, her dissertation and research project for Protame have been destroyed, the press is camped out at her door and Oliver is not taking her calls. She's finally had enough. She's determined to confront Oliver once and for all. She convinces her roommate to sneak her out of their apartment and take her to Oliver's home and fortunately, he's at home. Oliver promises to handle everything. Throughout it all, Becka comes to the chilling realization that she truly loves Oliver and doesn't want to live her life without him. He convinces Becka to stay with him and pleads with her to  trust him - again. Mistake??? We'll see! No spoilers from me but I will say this....Buckle up and hang on! It's one heck of a great ride! Beautiful intelligent grad student with a mind of her own-check! Handsome alpha male billionaire who refuses to take no for an answer-check! Wealthy, charismatic accuser intent on destroying his ??????-check! No Spoilers! Lies, deceit, betrayal, blackmail, extortion and some very serious allegations accusing animal abuse, cruelty and experimentation-check! A little mystery, suspense and a few secrets-check!  Heated attraction, fiery passion, instant chemistry and steamy dreamy sex-you bet! That and a whole lot more! Fabulous entertainment and an awesome read!

Title: AlphaDesignation: Paranormal Shifter Romance CollectionAuthors: MultipleMy Rating: Five Super Sexy StarsWoo-Hoo! Another fabulous bundle by some of my favorite authors packed full of super sexy shifters and hot paranormal romance. I love multi-author bundles because I not only get to enjoy some of my favorite authors but I also get to try new authors without breaking the bank and anytime I can save money, it's a win-win in my book! I've already read several of the books in this collection and totally loved them. I haven't finished the entire collection but I've enjoyed every story so far. Some of them I read when they were originally released by each author and loved them so much, I wanted to tell you a little bit about each of the ones I've read. I feel that I must tell you up front, Found: Mate of the Cave Bear by Harmony Raines, Her Two Bears by Catherine Vale, Called by the Bear by V. Vaughn and Curse of the Alpha, Parts One and Two are NOT standalone stories but are the first in a series. Claiming His Fate is also the first release in a series but it does Not end with a cliffhanger. But one thing is for sure, you can't beat the price. You definitely get your money's worth so snuggle in and enjoy!1) Title: Claiming His Fate by Ellis LeighGreat Balls of Fire! Claiming His Fate is the first book in Ellis Leigh's exciting series, Feral Breed Motorcycle Club and it is totally knocked out AWESOME! I loved it! This was my first time reading Ms Leigh's work and I was completely shell-shocked by her amazing talent, incredible imagination and unique, raw style of writing. I am officially a fan! The story is exciting, powerful, compelling, thrilling, addictive, romantic, arousing and sensual. The dialog is raw, gritty, smart and very well written. The characters are imaginative, captivating, fascinating, intriguing and sexy as sin! These characters grab your panties and hold them in a twist! Oh my! I was on the edge of my seat from the very first page until the very last! Wow! What a ride! Sexy Abraham "Rebel" Lynch has been a wolf shifter since he was turned in 1794. For the last 200 years he has struggled for balance between his human side and his inner wolf because a lack of control is a sure-fire death sentence for him at the hands of his brothers, the Feral Breed Motorcycle Club, the protectors of the secret for the wolf shifters of North America. And that certainly would be very bad since he is the President for the Great Lakes Den. They are his family and everything he needs or so he thought - until he lays eyes on human Charlotte aka Cherry at Amnesia Gentlemen's Club- with her beautiful blonde hair, bright green eyes and very luscious curves! She is beautiful and perfect! She is sin and sex -  she is his mate! So darn dreamy! Sigh.....But his mate is in grave danger from a psychotic rogue wolf - a man-eater and he must not fail his mate. Charlotte lost her parents in a tragic accident and is struggling to support her blind younger brother. She has no time for relationships.  But when she sees handsome Rebel Lynch, she sees hot candied sex on a stick and she wants a lick! She knows he's trouble but her brain doesn't get the memo because she just can't seem to fight the immediate attraction and sexual chemistry she feels for the sexy biker. But she has no idea that Rebel is a wolf! Huh! What the heck? Wolf shifters really exist? But Rebel demands too much too soon from his lovely mate and at what cost? Will he be able to save her? Maybe it's time for Rebel to stop fighting and finally realize that he and his wolf are two halves of the same soul. Can he embrace his wolf and claim his mate? Maybe, just maybe, it's time for Rebel to stop rebelling and stop being "the rebel". A wonderful journey of self discovery and love! Sexy wolf shifters-check! Beautiful smart curvy human heroine-check! Action, adventure and great cast of characters-check! Romance and steamy sex-check and check! Yeah baby! Fantastic entertainment and an awesome read! I can hardly wait for Book Two!My Rating: Five Super Sexy Stars*****2) Title: Found: Mate of the Cave Bear by Harmony RainesFound: Mate of the Cave Bear, The Dualis Book OneOh My! Harmony Raines has done it again! And just what has she done, you ask? She has published an amazing new serial called The Dualis. Yes, I said serial which means multiple books and dare I say it - cliffhangers! Yikes! But don't despair folks! Although the serial does consist of three separate installments, fortunately for us, Raines released all three on the same day! Woohoo - no waiting! I settled in and decided to read all three in one sitting so I'm writing only one review for the entire series and will post it for each book. Never fear, there will be NO spoilers!  Harmony Raines has always exhibited exceptional talent and imagination in her writing but in this series, she has far exceeded my expectation of her skill in creating something new, fresh and original that encompasses not one genre, but several. She has skillfully combined paranormal romance with science fiction and fantasy to create a fascinating and intriguing world of the past and future, filled to the brim with action, adventure, suspense, love and hope. The story is original, exciting, suspenseful, thrilling, heartbreaking, heartwarming, sweet, romantic and sensual. These are only a few of the words that came to mind while I was reading this story. The dialogue is clean, smart and flows well. The characters are intriguing, captivating and engaging. This is a romance and does include some sex scenes, however, they don't overpopulate the book. Raines has dared to venture outside the box with this story and I love it! Now, let's talk about the basics of the story itself.The premise of the story:It is now the twenty second century and through the use of research and technology, scientists have learned how to manipulate and alter human DNA. For too many years, children have been genetically engineered by doctors and scientists allowing parents to choose eye color, body type and even gender. These developments have contaminated the gene pool and brought evolution to a halt. The world is now in desperate need of new blood, or rather uncontaminated blood from the past with new stem cells.Now for the plot of the story:Tworn Corporation has developed a time machine which can create a worm hole enabling a person to travel through the time. It is their intention to send a young woman 30,000 years into the past to find a primitive man, become pregnant with his child and then return through the wormhole by means of a tether, to the future. Her child would be used for the benefit of mankind and become the savior of the world. Huh? No pressure - right? Jenna is chosen to be that woman because she met several vital and important requirements. She has no fillings in her teeth, he's never had any broken bones or surgical procedures and most importantly, she's a virgin meaning she nor her DNA has ever been tainted by a male from her time. She considers herself to be unattractive and unremarkable. Obviously Tworn Corporation agrees and believes there is absolutely nothing to distinguish her as being from the twenty second century. Although some may see this opportunity as a great honor, Jenna is not doing this for recognition nor the advancement of mankind. She's simply doing it for the money. Now don't start thinking badly of Jenna just yet. She wants the money for purely unselfish motives - her mother became terminally ill and as a result, Jenna inherited the astronomical debt for the medical bills after her mother's death. She's from a very poor family and could never live long enough to pay off the debt, so here she is, about to travel back in time. She's given six months of training to prepare her for her journey but Jenna soon suspects there is much more to this mission than Mr. Trimble with Tworn Corporation is telling her but she has no idea what it could be. She begins to have her doubts but fears for her safety if she doesn't complete her mission. But they never prepare her for the entry into the land of the past and I mean that quite literally because she tumbles from the wormhole high above the ground with nothing to help to break her fall. She plummets into a heavily forested area and is seriously injured. She is found by Haran who is a Dualis, a primitive, a "cave bear", who reluctantly and begrudgingly nurses her back to health. This is how Haran refers to himself - a cave bear, a Dualis, meaning of two natures, man and beast. Haran is a primitive bear shifter and lives alone in a cave. After the heartbreaking loss of his parents at a young age, he has chosen to be alone and never take a mate. But Haran soon discovers that fate can never be denied. The attraction he feels for the strange young woman proves to be too strong to resist and he quickly falls in love with the beautiful, curvaceous Masu that falls from the sky. She should be his enemy, not his mate. Huh? He only kills for food but the Masu hunt and kill for the pleasure they draw from cruelty and fear. She is Masu and not to be trusted! Nope, never going to happen - he will resist! He will??? Jenna has no clue that she looks like the Masu, his enemy. Heck, she doesn't even know who they are but one thing she does know, she's incredibly attracted to Haran and she wants him - in her arms and in her bed, or should I say her furs. Jenna now realizes that quite possibly, she may never want to give up her child if she becomes pregnant nor return to her own time! What? Will Jenna survive her injuries? Will she become pregnant? Will she ever return to her time? Can Haran protect her from his enemies? Or will Haran perish in his fight with the Masu? Are there other shifters in this time and if so, where are they and will they help? Oh my! No spoilers here but I will say this......Beautiful, virtuous heroine-check! Sexy, primitive but intelligent bear shifter-check! Large cast of fascinating characters including other types of shifters-check! Oops! Uh-oh! I may have just let a little spoiler slip out! Danger, drama, suspense, action, heinous enemies and evil machinations-check! Heated attraction, sweet romance, heartbreaking angst and some  heartwarming, arousing sex-you bet! That and a whole lot more!Execution of the story:My personal opinion - Well done! I'm not a science/tech geek so I don't require a detailed scientific or technical explanation on how the time travel was actually accomplished, but I was totally captivated by the true essence and message of this story - love can prevail.  Remember folks, this is fiction and fantasy, so keep an open mind.  If you want to try something original and a little different yet quite refreshing, then this is the book for you. Deliciously sweet, completely captivating and delightfully entertaining!My Rating: Five Delightfully Entertaining Stars*****3) Her Two Bears by Catherine ValeWow! I absolutely loved it! Catherine Vale's amazing talent, incredible skill and unique style shine brightly in her latest release, Her Two Bears. Vale never fails to excite, tantalize and entertain her readers while always leaving us satisfied, warm and all fuzzy inside. I love a great paranormal, romantic happily ever after story and Vale is definitely a master at giving her readers just that, in spades! The story is exciting, compelling, romantic, sweet, arousing, sensual and steamy. The dialog is smart and well written. The characters are captivating, engaging, endearing and sexy. Beautiful curvy Sadie is pretty much fed up with the dating scene. She's certainly had more than her fair share of bad encounters and terrible relationships. Her best friend Peyton, seeing Sadie's unhappiness, sets her up on a blind date with not one, but two gorgeous guys - at the same time! Huh? A little unorthodox- maybe - but Sadie decides to go with the flow and live on the wild side, even if it's just for one date. And Sadie doesn't regret it, not for one minute, because her dates, Dane and Jackson, are the two hottest guys she's ever seen! Wowza! Dane and Jackson are both instantly attracted to the sexy Sadie and they want her, badly, and at the same time! What? Yep, they are co-alphas of their clan and they want her as their mate. Now all they have to do is convince her to mate them both --- and tell her that they are both bear shifters! Huh? What the heck? Sparks fly! Attraction builds! Desires burn! Passion ignites! Oh my! Fabulous entertainment and an awesome read!My Rating: Five Super Hot Stars*****

Title: The Vampire's Mail Order BrideSeries: Nocturne Falls, Book OneDesignation: Standalone Novel, NO CliffhangerAuthor: Kristen PainterReading Platform: Kindle EditionMy Rating: FIVE DIVINELY ENTERTAINING STARS*****Wow! I absolutely love it! The Vampire's Mail Order Bride is the  first release in the delightfully entertaining new series, Nocturne Falls, by Kristen Painter and it is delectably delicious. (Pun intended) The series is a paranormal romance based on all manner of supernatural beings who live and work among humans in a town named Nocturne Falls where it's  Halloween every day of the year.  And they celebrate it big time since it's the town's main source of income. How could you not love it with names like The Scream Shop, Hallowed Bean, Howlers and Insomnia and that's only a few.  And did I mention it's located in Georgia. Oh yes, and I live in Georgia which makes me love it even more, not that I need another reason because there are plenty of reasons to love this book solely on its own merit. It's exceptionally well crafted, well executed, well edited and well developed. The characters are engaging, endearing and at times, laugh at loud funny.  It's sweet, exciting, humorous and romantic with just the right amount of danger, intrigue and suspense. And of course, it wouldn't be complete without a large dollop of angst. This is my first time reading Kristen Painter's work but it certainly won't be my last! This is a standalone novel and does include a deliciously sweet happy ending. I don't want to give anything away but I will say that it does include vampires, witches, werewolves, gargoyles, fae and all manner of creatures we all know and love including humans, a very spoiled Maine Coon(cat) and a meddling grandmother. I also must warn you - it does contain a feisty, brave, beautiful, straight-shooter, human heroine who just happens to be a chocolate lover and a self proclaimed confectionery artist with a mind of her own and a handsome, hunky, wealthy, protective male vampire hero who is determined to never fall in love again.  So don't say I didn't warn you, because when determined Delaney and stubborn Hugh meet, well, let's just say that sparks fly, chocolate melts and Nocturne Falls may never be the same again. Hugh never even knew what hit him! Oh my!  Did I say that I loved it? I may have mentioned it but just in case, I love it! I'm ready for Book Two in this enchanting series. This book does NOT contain hardcore profanity nor explicit sex,  however, the sex is inferred and is totally dreamy!

Title: Enslaved by the Alpha: Part FourSeries: Shifters of NunavutDesignation: Part Four of an Multi-Installment Serial,  Not a Standalone, Does Include CliffhangerAuthor: Viola RivardReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: FIVE SUPER SEXY STARS*****Yowza! New York Times and USA Today bestselling author Viola Rivard has knocked it out of the park - again! Enslaved by the Alpha is a multi-installment serial and first release in her captivating new series, Shifters of Nunavut and folks, it's a real firecracker! And it just keeps getting better and better! The story is exciting, edgy, thrilling, imaginative, humorous, arousing, romantic and seductive. Oh, and did I mention hot? Oh yes, it's definitely hot! The narrative is exceptionally well written in the third person with alternating his and her points of view. The dialogue is well executed and flows effortlessly. And the characters... well, they're always the best part of Viola's stories. Don't get me wrong, Viola's books are always fast paced, well crafted, well developed and well edited and truly, a pleasure to read but it's her characters that I fall in love with every single time. Her characters are always unique, captivating, engaging, endearing and at times, laugh out loud funny but above all else, Viola creates, hands down, the  most grumpy, growly, quite possibly irredeemable and certainly the most arrogant male antiheroes of anyone I know. You know, the kind we love to hate but secretly love, and of course, are always devilishly handsome.(Swoon....) And the male protagonist in this story is no exception. The interaction and banter between male and female protagonist is delightful and often hilarious and their sexual  chemistry is almost palpable. Viola skillfully combines all of these elements to craft a delightfully entertaining paranormal tale filled to the brim with heart-pounding danger, heartbreaking drama, heart-stopping action, spine-tingling adventure, side-splitting humor and let's not forget, steamy, dreamy romance. When I read a Viola Rivard story, I'm always reminded of the Carly Simon song, Nobody Does It Better. The words replay in my mind: Nobody does it better, Makes me feel sad for the rest, Nobody does it half as good as you, Baby you're the best. And Viola definitely is the best! Buckle up my lovelies! It's another wild ride! And this time, we travel to the tundra of the Arctic for our story.Book One:Twenty-eight year old Astrid Castello is very much out of her element. As a native Floridian, the climate of the Arctic tundra definitely does not agree with her and it's all her younger sister Ginnifer's fault. Months ago, her sister had traveled to the Arctic to film a documentary on the way of life of werewolf packs living in the area and after finishing her film, she returned to the Siluit Pack and Zane, their alpha, is holding her prisoner.If her sister isn't already dead and Astrid can somehow manage to rescue her, then she's going to kill her for this. She doesn't even really like her sister but here she is, neck deep in trouble in the Arctic, trying to rescue her sister for her parents' sake. Yes, it's for them because she doesn't want to tell them that their favored daughter has traveled back to Nunuvat to live with the Siluit werewolf pack. And it has cost her everything including all her money! Well, technically the twelve thousand dollars she paid for her guides was actually Ginnifer's money since she withdrew(stole) it from Ginnifer's bank account but she wouldn't have had to do it if Ginnifer had stayed at home instead of traipsing all over the globe as a freelance documentary filmmaker. And now, she finds herself in the middle of nowhere with a group of men who started out as her very kind guides but had now turned into a group of opportunists who were only interested in poaching the furs of werewolves and probably murdering her. Her plan was to travel to the location of the Amarok Pack and try to make a deal with their Alpha, Erik, to enlist his help in recovering her sister from the rival Siluit Pack where her sister is being held. Unfortunately, her meeting with the Amarok Pack did not go as planned. She has seriously underestimated the sheer and savagery of the werewolves because the wolves of the Amarok pack have just slaughtered all of her very questionable guides, leaving only her alive. Oh my! Erik is a handsome, arrogant, ruthless and very selfish wolf who is determined to have things his way and unfortunately, there's only one deal the Alpha is willing to accept - her. Huh? Oh yes, Erik demands that she give herself willingly to him in exchange for him helping to rescue her sister. Oh my goodness! What's a girl to do? Why, make a deal, of course! Sadly, Astrid soon realizes that she has truly sacrificed everything to rescue her sister from the clutches of a demon and in the process, has ended up selling her own soul to the devil. Oh my!  Will Astrid somehow manage to save her sister and herself or will she be Erik's new plaything until he grows tired of her and gives her to another wolf???Book Two:The story continues with Astrid struggling to find her place in the pack while learning exactly what being owned by Erik entails. At the same time, Erik is desperately struggling to control his wolf, something he has never had a problem with before. Apparently his beast believes that Astrid is his mate and is determined to have her and only her.Oh my! Will Erik be able to maintain his control or will he lose the battle to his wolf??? Will Astrid be able to convince Erik to rescue her sister from the Siluit Pack???Book Three:The story continues with Erik finally agreeing to send a group of wolves to the Siluit Pack to rescue Ginnifer but after Astrid reveals a possible relationship between Ginnifer and the Alpha, Zane, Erik changes his plans and decides to make the journey himself and use Astrid as a bargaining chip to gain access to the Siluit Pack's hunting grounds. Their dangerous journey results in changes in the relationship between the two unlikely lovers and Erik begins to see Astrid in a new light. Maybe his wolf wasn't so wrong after all. But will they be able to rescue Ginnifer from Zane or does she even need saving???Book Four: Astrid learns that her sister Ginnifer is now mated to Zane. What? Oh yes! And they truly love each other and are expecting their first child. She has sacrificed her life for nothing. Well, maybe nothing is stretching the truth since Erik now seems determined to make her his mate. Huh? Oh my! Originally, Erik had planned to just take her until he tired of her and then give her to another member of his pack but he has quickly come to the sudden realization that he wants no one else to even touch her - ever! Oh my goodness! He wants her to become his mate in every since of the word including giving her a pup - his pup! Erik discovers that he truly likes the idea and having her as his mate and having a pup of his own to teach and to one day become alpha of his pack. He likes it a lot but Astrid doesn't appear to be enthusiastic about the idea. She knows she become pregnant and have a child - she's already tried. That's what broke up her marriage. So, she convinces Erik to accept a bargain - if she's not pregnant by spring, he will allow her to leave and go back home to Florida. Hmmm....But is leaving Erik what she really wants??? Has Erik's harsh and abrasive personality turned Astrid against him for good or could she be developing real feelings for the handsome, aggressive alpha??? Unfortunately, there are members of the Amarok pack who oppose their mating for reasons of their own and Astrid's life may be at risk. Can Astrid ever be truly safe with the Erik's pack??? I guess we'll have to wait and see. No spoilers from me but I will say this......Arrogant, ruthless, dominant Alpha wolf who takes what he wants regardless of the consequences and may just be irredeemable-check! Curvaceous, naive heroine who is on a mission to save her sister and may just talk the alpha wolf to death-check! A sister who is 'supposedly' being held captive by a rival werewolf pack-check! A cast of wonderful characters-check! Danger, drama, action, adventure and enemies galore-check! Humor, heated attraction, unconventional romance and steamy dreamy sex-you bet! That and a whole lot more! I can hardly wait for the next installment! Seriously sexy, completely captivating and delightfully entertaining!

Title: A Soldier of ShadowsSeries: A Shade of VampireDesignation: Book Nineteen of a Multi-Novel series, NOT a Standalone ReadAuthor: Bella ForrestGenre: Young Adult Paranormal RomanceReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: FIVE MAGNIFICENT STARS *****Wow! Best-selling author Bella Forrest has dazzled her readers yet again with A Soldier of Shadows, the nineteenth release in her spellbinding mega-hit series, A Shade of Vampire and she has totally left me breathless- again! Like thousands of my fellow Shaddicts, I've been hooked from the very first book of the series and now anxiously await each release. I simply can't get enough! I was turning the pages so fast, my Kindle Fire couldn't keep up! Just when I think there's no way this series can get any better - wham - Bella hits us with another knockout! Bella has surprised us all with another riveting adventure that curls our toes, makes our hearts pound and keeps us begging for more! This is a paranormal/supernatural/fantasy saga so unlike any other I've ever read. It is exciting, well crafted, original, unique, imaginative, thrilling, fast paced, riveting, action packed, mysterious, suspenseful, enchanting, heartbreaking, heartwarming, seductive, passionate and oh so romantic. Whew, what a mouthful, but these are only a few of the words that come to mind after reading this incredible chronicle of the Shade, its inhabitants and its enemies. Can you tell that I really love this story? The narrative is exceptionally well written in the first person with a multitude of alternating points of view. Each chapter is told by one of the characters which I feel gives so much more depth, intensity and perspective to the story and adds to the complexity and understanding of the characters. The dialogue is smart, exceptionally well executed, well edited and flows effortlessly. Although the story is compelling and the dialogue is exceptional, it's truly the magnificent, comprehensive cast of larger than life characters that makes the biggest impact. They are well developed, captivating, intriguing, engaging, endearing and quite literally, out of this world sexy! They explode from the page, grab your imagination, capture your heart and hold you totally enthralled from beginning to end. Forrest skillfully combines these elements to craft a stunningly brilliant masterpiece of paranormal romance filled to the brim with action, adventure, fantasy, mystery, suspense, magic, supernatural beings, love, passion, loyalty, heartbreak, hope and plot twists that will blow your mind.In Book Nineteen, our story resumes in The Shade after the attempt is made to transform Ben Novak, Prince of the Shade, back to human. Unfortunately, the attempt fails miserably but during the ordeal, Ben has a vision of being taken to Cruor, the home of the Elders, while being held captive as a baby by the Hawks. While Ben struggles to recover from the unsuccessful transformation, River leaves the Shade with the aid of one their witches to seek her family and return with them to the Shade but surprisingly discovers they have been captured and taken to The Oasis. Ben and River must now face a painful and unexpected truth. In order to gain the answers they seek, both must return to The Oasis and hopefully also find and free River's family. But none of the residents of the Shade anticipate the new player that has joined this dark and mystifying game of life and death - Nuriya, Queen of the Nasiri Jinn and the real mistress of The Oasis - a new and unknown enemy to Derek, King of the Shade. One, it seems, they can't defeat. Through their trials, Ben and River continue to grow even closer and as our two unlikely lovers and heroes continue their struggle to survive and attempt to save the ones they love, the residents of the Shade continue to face challenges of their own - challenges that only the dragons, the newest additions to the Shade, can offer insight and help to defeat. Additional important pieces to the puzzle are slowly revealed only to be replaced by even more perplexing questions. Oh my! Will Ben and River be successful in their new quest to free their families??? Will Ben ever discover the answers he so desperately needs??? Will they survive another journey to The Oasis??? Will Ben ever be able to free himself from the life with which he has now been cursed to live??? Will Jeramiah finally be able to exact his revenge??? We'll see!!! No spoilers from me but I will say this......Handsome, guilt-stricken, newly turned vampire who can't control his bloodlust-check! Beautiful half-blood heroine who gets caught up in what she once thought to be only fantasy and fairy tales-check! A plethora of supernatural characters including vampires, werewolves, witches, dragons, ogres, hawks, jinn, mermaids, mermen and even a hellhound-you bet!
