Danger, drama, adventure, suspense, mind blowing plot twists and a dangerous new enemy-you bet! A possible romance for Ben and River-it's looking very probable!!! That and a whole lot more! I love it! I never tire of visiting my friends of 'The Shade'. It always feels like returning home. If you love heart-wrenching young adult paranormal romance, heartbreaking angst, tantalizing magic, out of this world fantasy, spine-tingling suspense, hold your breath action, malevolent enemies, evil machinations, unexpected plot twists and heart-pounding adventure, then you will surely enjoy A Shade of Vampire series. Buckle up my lovelies! It's another wild, wonderful and thrilling ride! Please keep in mind, this is a series - not a stand alone story and the books should be read in order of their release - and it does contain nail biting cliffhangers that will leave you on the edge of your seat panting for more - which I love! Bella always keeps us on our toes but lovingly rewards our patience with each new release. Well done, Bella, very well done! I can hardly wait to read what happens next with Derek, Sophia, Caleb, Rose, Ben, River, Claudia, Yuri, Vivienne, Xavier, Aiden, Corrine, Ibrahim and all the other wonderful residents of the Shade when Ben's adventure continues in Book 20! And a few of our old favorites from the early books even make a return! Charmingly captivating, seriously sexy, powerfully compelling and delightfully entertaining!!!My Rating: FIVE MAGNIFICENTLY ENTERTAINING STARS *****

Title: What He WantsDesignation: Volumes One thru Six of Multi-Installment SerialAuthor: Hannah FordMy Rating: FIVE SUPER SEXY STARS*****Individual Titles Included:1) What He Wants; 2) What He Craves; 3) What He Demands; 4) What He Needs; 5) What He Desires; 6) What He ProtectsFirst, please allow me to state: this is a multi-installment serial. It is NOT a standalone story and does include cliffhangers. I realize this may not be everyone's cup of tea but personally, I enjoy the shorter installments as long as they're published regularly and Hannah's books are generally released once or twice a month. They are absolutely perfect for a quick lunch time read or a relaxing break between heavy, full-length novels. These installments are the equivalent of only a few chapters but Hannah always delivers quite the punch with each. I know that there have been some reviewers who are unhappy about the length and cost of each installment but I subscribe to the Amazon Kindle Unlimited Program which allows me to borrow and read an unlimited number of book each month for only ten dollars a month. Despite Amazon's recent policy and payment changes which resulted in many authors removing their books from Kindle Unlimited, Hannah has kept her books available through  program which I do appreciate.Wow! I am in love with this series! What He Wants is a sinfully seductive multi-installment serial by Hannah Ford and it totally rocked my world! Each successive release becomes more exciting, exhilarating and suspenseful. The story is well crafted, exciting, thrilling, compelling, powerful, mysterious, suspenseful, enticing, addictive, romantic, arousing, sensual and steamy. The narrative is well written and the dialogue is smart, well executed and flows effortlessly. The characters are well developed, fascinating, captivating, engaging, intriguing and sexy as sin. This story is so much more than just a contemporary romance. Oh yes, it's most definitely sensual, erotic and romantic but it's also a thrilling, chilling, suspenseful, spine-tingling whodunit which will have you desperately scrambling to fit the puzzle pieces together to determine the identity of the killer. Law student Charlotte Holloway may only be 21 but she has worked tirelessly to gain favor with her law professor and now she finally has the long awaited opportunity to prove her worth. She has been assigned to work with him on a very high profile murder case. The client is a none other than Noah Cutler, a very powerful and sought after attorney himself. But at her first meeting with the new client, she realizes that Noah is her mysterious one time hookup from the bar the previous night. Huh? What the heck? And as women connected to Noah continue to turn up dead, Charlotte is drawn deeper and deeper into his life and his world of BDSM. And it seems that Noah Cutler has plans for Charlotte. But what are his motives and what plans does have in store for the lovely Charlotte? Will Charlotte become another victim? Oh my! Sexy dominant attorney-check! Beautiful submissive law student-check! Danger, murder, mystery, betrayal, intrigue and suspense-check! Romance and steamy sex-yeah baby! One heck of a great ride! Seriously sexy, completely captivating and delightfully entertaining.

Title: Vidalia: A 'Not Quite' Vampire Love StorySeries: The 'Not Quite' Love Story SeriesDesignation: Book One, Stand-alone short story, NO CliffhangerAuthor: Julia MillsReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: FIVE DELIGHTFULLY ENTERTAINING STARS*****Wow! Julia Mills has knocked it out of the park again with her latest release, Vidalia: A 'Not Quite' Vampire Love Story.  I absolutely loved it! I became a loyal reader and Julia Mills fan last year after reading the first book in her best-selling Dragon Guard Series and now 10 releases later, I'm still a die-hard fan. All of her stories are exceptional but this fast-paced, fun-filled, laugh-out-loud funny, supernatural romantic suspense/comedy is absolutely extraordinary. Yes, I do sometimes make up words because I just really like how they sound.  Don't you just love the way fanglessly sounds??? So, sue me. No, please don't, I was just kidding. The story has everything you need to make a great read. Like what, you ask? Well, it has excitement, suspense, danger, drama and lots and lots of snark, sass and humor. Oh, and did I mention romance? Oh yes, it has that too, in spades along with dreamy sex. It's well crafted, well written and well edited. The narrative is written in the first person from the point of view of the female protagonist. Always a big plus in my book. The characters are well developed, engaging, endearing and will steal your heart. So, what do you get when you combine a sassy, fangless, not quite dead, family cursed vampire named Vidalia Fitzsimmons who is the medical examiner in Atlanta and also happens to be the heiress to the Georgia Onion Empire with a  handsome, smexy Buckhead Police Department detective, add a healthy measure of super hot romance and then throw in a spine-tingling whodunit? A deliciously cute and delightfully entertaining, can't-put-down read! What didn't I love about this story? Not a darn thing!

Title: Taming the MonsterDesignation: Collection of Standalone NovellasGenre: Paranormal/Supernatural/Fantasy/Sci-Fi BundleAuthor: Multiple AuthorsReading Platform: Kindle Edition PurchaseMy Rating: FIVE SPECTACULARLY ENTERTAINING STARS*****Wow! What a divinely entertaining box set of completely new, standalone, spellbinding novellas from seventeen of the best-known and best-selling authors in paranormal romance! And of course, it's also a phenomenal value! First, I would like to emphasize that the books offered in this bundle are NOT teasers, excerpts, nor first installments but complete standalone stories. Although they may be part of a previously published series, reading the other books of that series is not required to follow, understand and enjoy these stories. So, your only requirement is to snuggle into your favorite jammies with your favorite beverage, then simply read and enjoy! Oh and there are NO cliffhangers! Woo-Hoo! I truly enjoy purchasing these bundles. It's not only a chance to read the authors I know and love but it's also a wonderful opportunity to sample new authors without breaking the bank. And that's always a win-win in my book! I've already read quite a few of the stories so far and they have all been well crafted, well written and well edited. Each and every one of the stories included in this compilation are original, unique, exciting, riveting, romantic and sinfully seductive. They have all been fascinating and completely captivating with wonderfully engaging characters who have captured not only my imagination but also my heart. This collection is filled to the brim with heart-pounding  adventure, magic and heartwarming, albeit sometimes heartbreaking, romance. If you love paranormal/supernatural romance, it's in this bundle. Or, if you're a science fiction fan, you're covered. Prefer magic and fantasy - it's also included. Love adventure - something for you too! There's most definitely a little "someum-someum" for everyone! If you're anything like me, once you pick it up and begin reading, you won't be able to put it down until the last page is read. As far back as I can remember, I have always loved to read. Even as a small child, reading was always my most cherished pastime and to this very day, it still remains my favorite. Through the wonder of books, I've escaped my life and explored countless, incredible worlds filled with magnificent settings and remarkable characters. I've read an incalculable number of books in my time and a large number of those have been multi-author bundles and I can say with absolute certainty, this is one of the best, if not the best, that I have read to date. As a matter of fact, once I started reading, it was almost impossible for me to stop. Below are a few of my thoughts on the stories I've finished.1) Carina Wilder is one of my all-time favorite authors. Her offering is Hunted, a riveting and very imaginative spin on the mythological character, Herne the Hunter, God of the Wild Hunt. Carina takes a tale of myth and legend and brings it to life and in the process, has restored my belief in the power of love. Ella traveled from Manhattan to England to find a reprieve from her down-spiraling life but found so much more than she ever expected. By taking a chance and a leap of faith, love and happiness can truly be found only a myth and festival away. It's just so dreamy. Sigh.....I loved it! Totally enthralling!2) Renee George is another of my favorite authors. Her offering, A Door to Midnight, is a story based on her Midnight Shift World Series. This was one of the sweetest stories in the collection and is also based on a character from fantasy, myth and lore - a chimera. Marcus Tsavaras is more than just a reclusive, mysterious and wealthy businessman. He's also a creature born from death, forced to live under an eternal curse but is finally able to find a life of peace and acceptance through a powerful gift of unselfish love. The story reinforces my belief that true love can defeat the greatest foe and can truly conquer all. Absolutely enchanting!3) Kilt in Space (Space Grit Series) by Ella Drake is one of the cutest stories in the collection. It is a delightful science fiction bursting with adventure, humor and sexy romance. Ella was a new author for me and this was my first time reading any of her work but it certainly won't be my last. This story reminds me that beauty is truly in the eye of the beholder and what some would perceive as a monster, may also be something which is so much more. I absolutely loved it! A deliciously sexy and quite humorous Sci-Fi Delight!4) Prince of Flight by Mandy Roth is a deliciously sexy tale and part of her King of Prey Series. Keonae is a not only a man of high birth, position and power but also a prince of the royal hawks. Scarred and disheartened after a devastating loss and betrayal, Keon leads a solitary and unhappy existence, all the while mourning the life he lost. His life is now one of self imposed exile in the human realm, refusing to love or be loved - until her - Lark. When fate steps in, Keon is forced to accept his destiny and a love he thought he would never have. Absolutely spell-binding! Mandy Roth is another of my all time favorite authors!5) Stranded with a Cajun by Michelle Pillow is a delightfully entertaining story based  on her Captured by a Dragon Shifter Series. Michelle became one of my favorite authors when I began following her books about the shifters of the planet Qurillixen several years ago and since, I've tried to read every book in the series. Each and every one of Michelle's stories are always exceptionally well crafted and written. This is a combination of paranormal and science fiction since the dragon shifters in the story, although believed to be originally from earth, are now from a planet called Qurillixen and travel to earth through a portal connecting the two planets (the equivalent of a worm hole) controlled by the royal families. Drake, also known as Dimosthenis, is not of royal blood and thereby forbidden to use the portal to travel to Earth to find a human female for a mate. Oh, did I forget to mention the entire planet suffers a shortage of women and very few females are even born on their world. Oh my! They need females and Drake is the last of his line and is in need of a mate. When did a little thing like permission and punishment ever stop a man when he's in need of a woman??? A fun-filled drago-licious adventure!6) Alien Disruption, part of the Captured by Aliens Series, by Jaide Fox is another delightful surprise in this collection. Jaide is another first time author for me but I will definitely be reading more of her work in the future. I had no idea when I started reading this story that it takes place near the Okefenokee Swamp in Georgia. I live near the Okefenokee Swamp and have taken the tour many times. I wonder how many space ships I missed seeing during the tour!??! Or how many Big-Foot Aliens!?!? A delightful new spin on Big Foot! I loved it! Deliciously cute and sexy!7) A Damned Deed, part of The Deed Brothers Series, is a story by another of my favorite authors, Michele Bardsley. She has a delightfully devilish sense of humor that compares to no other author I know. And she definitely puts it to good use in every one of her books and this one was no exception. Athena Davis is one capable but very tough cookie. She lives for her job and her one-eyed pit bull, Max, who just happens to be female. Athena is a hired gun(basically an assassin) who takes no prisoners and makes no apologies - ever. After a devastating loss of her family, she has survived by refusing to love or be loved. She lives her life on the road, moving from job to job and place to place by driving her Demon(her car) with her beloved pittie along for the adventure - until her current target, Adam Deed, turns out to be more than she could have ever imagined. But what can you expect from a devilishly handsome, half angel and half demon hybrid who acts like he could eat you up and enjoy every morsel! Oh my! Let's not forget about all of his supernatural brothers and sisters who insist on joining the party! Oh, and their seriously creepy and very evil dad! Oh my goodness! Seriously sexy and delectably entertaining!Well, that's enough from me. I think you get the picture. I love everything so far and I seriously need to get back to my reading. I highly recommend this bundle and I feel sure, you will find several stories you will enjoy. Fabulous entertainment and a monster of a deal!!!

Title: Because He Breaks MeSeries: Because He Owns MeDesignation: Book Five, An Alpha Billionaire Multi-Installment Serial, NOT a Standalone Story, Does include CliffhangerAuthor: Hannah FordReading Edition: Kindle UnlimitedHeat Level: Scorching HotMy Rating: FIVE DIVINELY ENTERTAINING STARS *****Yowza! Because He Breaks Me is the fifth riveting installment in the sinfully seductive new serial, Because He Owns Me, by Hannah Ford and may I just say - WOW! Like really, really WOW! Please be aware, as I stated previously, this is an ongoing serial and there will be multiple installments. If you haven't read Books One thru Four of the series, PLEASE STOP HERE. I began reading Ford's work a few months ago when I discovered her What He Wants Series. She seems to specialize  in serialized multi-installment novels with each release being the equivalent of one or two chapters totaling 35 to 50 pages each. I find that I actually enjoy this concept very much as long as the books are released weekly or bi-monthly and hers generally are. Each book is a quick enjoyable read and perfect for what I like to call a palette cleanser - something to stop sensory overload, relax my mind and enjoy in between heavy, full-length novels. Ms Ford is exceptionally talented in crafting realistic stories with complex characters and suspenseful plot twists. She also excels at maintaining the momentum of the story throughout the entire book without having to use empty filler dialogue to pace the continuation of the plot. If it's there, you better believe it means something and will be important to the story at some point. Her stories are fast paced and always filled with unexpected, suspenseful and surprising twists at every turn. She keeps us guessing and on our toes, wondering what will happen next. She has quickly become one of my favorite authors. The story is exciting, enchanting, romantic, seductive and arousing. The narrative is exceptionally well written in the first person with alternating his and her points of view although the main POV seems to come from Adriana O'Connor aka "Lemon", the female lead of the story. The dialogue is smart, snappy, raw and compelling. The characters are powerful, captivating, complex, engaging, intriguing and sexy as sin. Ford skillfully crafts these elements into an enticingly sweet cocktail of adult romance with a dash of mystery, suspense and a very erotic twist of BDSM. This story grabbed me from the beginning and won't let go! I can't seem to get enough of Callum and Lemon! It's absolutely captivating! Ford keeps us guessing and on our toes - again!Book One: This story features recent college graduate Adriana O'Connor who has recently moved from Michigan to New York City to find a job, hopefully in a publishing house and start her new life. Although not unfamiliar with the ways of the world, she is quite naive. And apparently, she is also quite submissive as is quickly discovered by handsome, charismatic billionaire Callum Wilder, CEO and Founder of Wilder Holdings, LLC. Adriana has agreed to meet Nathan, whom she met on a dating app, for a blind date at Whipped, a club located in Midtown Manhattan. Nathan is a no-show and leaves the lovely Adriana waiting alone. Adriana is totally unaware that whipped is a BDSM Light Club and is caught totally off guard when she catches the eye of someone else... someone dark, handsome and much more experienced...someone who wants to dominate and own her...for only one night. What? One night??? Handsome billionaire  Callum Wilder is immediately taken with the innocent young beauty sitting alone in the bar but Callum does not date nor does he do relationships. So what does he want with the lovely, innocent Adriana??? Well. he wants one night only of complete possession and mind-blowing sex! What??? Yep, one night and what arrogant and self assured Callum Wilder wants, he pursues and conquers - for one night only, of course! Oh my! But will he be able to conquer and claim the guileless inexperienced Adriana??? Or will she turn down his unabashed invitation???Book Two: Callum Wilder is a man on a mission and that mission is to possess the fair skin beauty Adriana, "Lemon" as he likes to call her, for one night. She ran away from him at the club and tried to put the entire incident out of her mind. But apparently it was never out of Callum's mind because somehow he finds her the very next day and all but demands that she join him for lunch. Of course it's not a lunch date because the arrogant Callum Wilder doesn't do dates. Riigghhtt.......not a date then!!! He's determined to have her and still wants her to submit to him for one night. Can he convince her to reconsider and accompany him on a business trip to Florida where he intends to have his wicked way with her - for only one night, of course!  Nope, she refuses his offer until........Well, I'll never tell! Yep, the unworldly Adriana is definitely in way over her head with the sophisticated, charming and very dominant Callum Wilder and if she isn't careful, she may just find herself swimming with a shark! Oh my gracious!  This is the one we've been waiting for.....Does she or doesn't she??? And who is Rose??? I'm dying to know!Book Three: Well, I'll go ahead and let the cat out of the bag! In Book Two we did learn that yes, she did accompany him on his private jet to his luxurious home in Florida for his "business" meeting. And yes she agreed to finally have sex with him, but....are you sitting down? Before he would touch her at all, she had to sign a privacy and a nondisclosure statement and an ironclad contract agreeing that it would be for ONLY one night; she was to never disclose any details, she could never tell anyone and she could never, ever contact him for any reason - no exceptions! And if by chance they ever meet again, she was to act as if she doesn't even know him at all? What the heck? And if that isn't enough, she also had to agree to be his submissive for the night, completely submit to his every command and to do anything and everything he wanted! Oh my! Surely, Adriana told him to take a long walk off a short pier, right? Wrong! And once their one night was over, he flew her back home to NYC without barely a word and dropped her like yesterday's garbage. Adriana is hurt, humiliated and brokenhearted. And just when she thinks her life is going down the toilet, she receives a call inviting her to a job interview at Archway Publishing. Did she even apply there? She's completed so many applications, she can't even remember but Adriana has a strong feeling that Callum may have had something to do with her job offer. And guess what? He did! What will Adriana do now? Will she or won't she accept the job?  Since returning from Florida after his one night with Adriana, Callum  is haunted by the her. Thoughts of making love to her consume his every waking moment. He can't concentrate on his work and that has never happened to him before - ever. He knows he can never be with her again. He simply can't loose control and break his one night only rule but damn, thoughts of her and her beautiful body are driving him insane? So, what's a handsome billionaire to do?  I'll never tell!Book Four: Adriana now has a new boss and a new job at Archway publishing, all thanks to Callum's recommendation. There's only one little problem - she isn't allowed to have a personal relationship with any of Archway's clients and Callum is definitely a client. Well, maybe there are actually two problems; the second one being that Callum won't leave her alone despite the contract he made her sign stating that she would never see or contact again. It seems Callum can't and won't abide by his own rules. Trying to conceal her past and current relationship from her boss, Kriesten, is becoming increasingly more difficult when Callum seems intent on breaking her resolve to not see him. And when she does see him, she simply can't resist him. What's a girl to do??? Why be literally kidnapped from a work related party by the handsome billionaire, of course!!!Callum Wilder has become a man possessed. He can't stop thinking about the beautiful luscious Lemon. He can't stand seeing another man touch his Lemon. He's breaking his own rules and doing the one thing he vowed to never do. But he's determined to not only possess her but own her as well - whether she likes it or not. Callum Wilder always gets what he wants and he wants Adriana - no matter the cost. No cost is too great for his lovely sweet Lemon. But will Lemon ever agree to his terms once he confesses the truth??? We'll see! Oh my goodness!Book Five:After another wonderful night with Callum, he has once again deserted Adriana after a night of wild sex leaving her alone at his apartment after quite literally kidnapping her from an Archway party. When Rose shows up the next morning and lets herself into the apartment with her own key, Adriana suddenly realizes the truth - this is not his actual residence but only an apartment he maintains apparently for sex. Huh? But before she can make a hasty retreat, Rose takes a drug overdose. Adriana is forced to call 911 and becomes swept up in the drama with Rose resulting in a confrontation with Callum at the hospital where she walks away from him determined to end their relationship for good - again. After refusing to accept his calls throughout the day, Callum breaks into Adriana's apartment that evening where she succumbs to his sexual advances and her feelings for him - again. After a wonderful night with Callum filled with surprising, first-time "vanilla sex", he finally confesses the true nature of his past and current relationship with Rose and makes Adriana a proposition - one in which she must sign another contract but in this one, he will own her - totally and completely - and control every aspect of her life. Unfortunately, the conditions will not be reciprocated; she will have no claim on him at all. What will Adriana decide? Will she once again be swept away by his charm and the feelings she has for him? Will she accept or refuse the terms of this relationship with Callum? And why is Jason, Callum's neighbor from Florida suddenly in New York and is he following Adriana??? We'll see!!!Buckle up my lovelies! Here we go again! I can hardly wait for the next installment! Deliciously seductive, seriously sexy, completely captivating and wonderfully entertaining! What more could you ask of a great read? Not a darn thing!!!

Book: Protected by HimSeries: Chosen by HimDesignation: Book Eight of a Multi-Installment Serial, NOT a Standalone StoryAuthor: Ellie DanesReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedHeat Level: MildMy Rating Five StarsWow! Ellie Danes has done it again! And just what has she done, you ask? She has released another spellbinding installment in her Chosen by Him series. Oh my! Protected by Him is the eighth book of the serial and is filled to the brim with deceit, lies, blackmail, betrayal, lust, love and consequences. And yes, I said series as in serial which means multiple installments and dare I say it, cliffhangers. Yikes! Each installment is relatively short and is perfect for a quick break or lunchtime read. So be forewarned, if you haven't read the first seven books of the series, please stop here. Although I recognize this may not be everyone's cup of tea, I personally love the excitement and anticipation of a great serial and look forward to those nail biting, what will happen next endings. And Danes delivers in spades! The story is fresh, modern, exciting, believable, riveting, romantic, arousing, seductive and sensual. This is not erotica but does contain some adult material including some very tasteful sex scenes. The dialogue is smart and flows well. The characters are the most important component in this story as seems to be the case in most of Danes books. They take center stage and as the story unfolds and Danes does an exceptional job of the development of her two main players. The book is written in the first person with his and her alternating points of view from the two primary players. However, all the characters are captivating, intriguing, engaging and realistic. She expertly combines these elements to craft a deliciously romantic and delightfully entertaining read. Twenty four year old MBA student, Summer Farris, is beautiful, intelligent and hard working and wants nothing more to excel and become successful in her field. Her current goal is to win a business internship with her professor, handsome, billionaire Chase Kerns but when she is passed over for one of the five coveted slots, she is beyond devastated. She and her roommate, Alyssa, decide to drown their mutual disappointment at a local bar just off campus where she sees Professor Kerns with one of his colleagues. After several drinks of liquid courage, Summer makes a fool of herself by confronting her professor and leaves the bar, embarrassed and quite a bit tipsy. She decides to walk home but is conveniently offered a ride by her professor. Hmmm.......I wonder if the handsome Professor Kerns is as attracted to the lovely Summer as she is to him. It seems he is! Oh my! Sparks Fly! This could be the recipe to either an exciting, loving relationship or a perfectly horrible disaster once Summer's ex-boyfriend, Brandon Porter enters the equation with intentions to blackmail sweet Summer. He needs money and his price to go away has risen from $10,000 to $500,000. He demands that Summer help him fleece Chase Kerns or else he will use his hacking skills to destroy not only Summer's life but also the people she cares about - again! What the heck? I wonder what Summer will decide??? Will she allow herself to be manipulated by Brandon or will she confess everything to Chase before it's too late? Or will Brandon succeed in his scheme of blackmail, fraud and extortion??? Oh my! Will love prevail or will Chase be hurt, used and betrayed - again??? Hmm....I wonder? No spoilers from me but I will say this......Beautiful, intelligent grad student who is hardworking, independent, career-minded, ambitious and very competitive-check! Handsome, charismatic billionaire who owns his own business but is also a college professor and is head over heels in lust with one of his students-check! A previous inappropriate relationship which ended in disaster and blackmail-check! A cruel,manipulative ex-boyfriend intent on blackmail-check! An upsetting and questionable burglary-check! Lies, deceit, blackmail, extortion, fraud and betrayal-check! Heated attraction, fiery passion, forbidden love, a healthy dose of agonizing angst and some sweet romance-you bet! That and a whole lot more! Oh my Glory! This just gets better and better! I can hardly wait to read the next installment! Fabulous entertainment and an awesome read!

Title: Wicked After DarkDesignation: Collection of Twenty Paranormal Full Length NovellasAuthor: Multiple AuthorsMy Rating: FIVE WICKED STARS*****OMG! What a fabulous collection! It's like an all you eat buffet by the who's who of the authors we all know and love! And the icing on the cake - it's for a very worthy cause! All proceeds benefit The Epilepsy Foundation. I personally have witnessed the devastating effects of epilepsy first hand by seeing a family member suffer from the this debilitating disease for years, so I would like to shout a big thank you to every single author who participated in this effort. I am familiar with quite a few of the authors in this set and I've read their stories individually but several of them are new to me and this will give me the opportunity to try their work without having to break the bank. The Witch, The Wolf and The Vampire is one of my favorite series of all time by the very talented A K Michaels. Her Dragon to Slay by Julia Mills is the first book in her bestselling Dragon Guard Series which I love! Mina Carter is another of my very favorite authors and her contribution to this set is The Reaper and the Cop and believe me when I say, it gives you thrills and chills! Melanie James is another of my favorites and her story, Conjuring Darkness will leave you breathless! Well, that's enough from me; I want to read the other stories in this great set. I've given you only a little hint of what you'll get in this remarkable collection! So, what are you waiting for me??? Get busy! Try it! Buy it! You'll love it! And remember, it's for a very worthy cause! Happy Halloween everyone!

Title: An Unexpected AffairSeries: Scottish WerebearDesignation: Book One, Standalone Novella, No CliffhangerAuthor: Lorlei MooneReading Platform: Kindle EditionMy Rating: FIVE DELICIOUSLY SWEET STARS*****Wow! An Unexpected Affair is the fabulous debut novella by up and coming new paranormal author Lorlei Moone and I must say, I'm thoroughly impressed. I would never have guessed that this was Moone's very first release. Although this release is the first book in Moone's Scottish Werebear Series, it is a standalone read and the couple do get their very sweet happy ending. No spoilers from me but I have a feeling that we'll see more of Clarice and Derek in the second book. The story is fast-paced but comfortable, well crafted and held my attention. The narrative is well written in the third person with alternating his and her points of view. The dialogue is smart, well executed and flows beautifully. The entire book is exceptionally well constructed, formatted and edited. It is always such a pleasure to read a book that is so well done. I found the characters to be very engaging and was able to connect with them immediately. Moone skillfully combines these elements into a captivating, easy to follow paranormal tale filled with adventure, heartbreaking angst and a large helping of sweet romance. I loved everything about this story and would definitely recommend it to anyone that loves paranormal romance. I very much look forward to reading the second book in this series.Beautiful, curvaceous Clarice Adler is fighting the clock and losing the battle. She's trying to recover from a painful breakup with her cheating, now ex-boyfriend and seems to have lost her muse somewhere along the way. Her deadline is looming and she's under tremendous pressure from her editor. She's lost faith in the whole idea of love and the complete irony of the situation is Clarice is a romance novelist. It's actually her job to write about love but the words refuse to come. So, how does a romance novelist write about love when she's completely stopped believing in it herself? What's an author to do??? Well, she rents a cabin at the secluded Scottish Isle of Hope for her very own private writer's retreat, of course. And does she find her muse??? Oh yes, she finds it...um...him, all right, and a whole lot more than even she could ever have imagined....or ever be able to write about! Oh my!Bear shifter Derek McMillan has been running the family farm alone for several years and has accepted the fact that he'll probably never find a mate. His parents are deceased and his only brother is always traveling and very seldom around.  Unlike wolf shifters, bears are solitary creatures and don't reside in packs. He does rent a few holiday cabins on his property to the occasional tourist for additional income but has never encountered any problems - until now. When his beautiful new tenant, Clarice Adler, shows up, his whole life changes in an instant. No matter how hard he tries to deny it, his bear instantly recognizes his mate but there's just one little problem. Well, maybe a few little problems. First, she's not a bear; she's human. Oh my! Second, he's not supposed to share his secret because according to their legends, humans used to hunt and kill shifters. Oh no! And third, bears and humans can't mate, can they??? We'll see! Beautiful, curvy romance novelist who fell out of love with love-check! Handsome bear shifter determined not to claim his human mate-check! A brother that lets the cat out of the bag or should I say bear-check! Danger, drama, a bad storm and a big secret-check! Heated attraction, sweet romance and a love that won't be denied-you bet! That and a whole lot more! Deliciously cute and delightfully entertaining!

Title: There's Snow EscapeSeries: Paranormal Dating AgencyDesignation: Book 7 of Series, Standalone Novella, No CliffhangerAuthor: Milly TaidenReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: FIVE FUN-FILLED STARS*****I love Milly Taiden! And just why do I love Milly Taiden, you ask? Because I can always count on her to deliver a great read - every single time! There's Snow Escape is the seventh release in her bestselling, mega-hit Paranormal Dating Agency Series and Taiden has knocked it out of the park - again! The story is original, well crafted, imaginative, exciting, cute, sweet, humorous, romantic, sensual and arousing. The narrative is exceptionally well written in the third person with alternating his, her and his points of view. And yes, I did say his twice because this is a paranormal romance with a menage a trois twist. Hubba! Hubba! I say paranormal but it's really a cross between paranormal, science fiction and a little bit of rock and roll. Just kidding! There is no rock and roll but it does rock! The dialogue is smart, sassy, amusing, well executed and flows beautifully. Taiden's books are always formatted professionally, well edited and the covers are beautiful. But my favorite element of this series is the characters. They are always well developed, captivating, engaging, endearing, sexy and at times, laugh out loud funny. Taiden's characters capture my heart and I immediately connect with them. Her heroines are always intelligent, big, bold and beautiful women with sassy attitudes and kind hearts. These girls are definitely the women you would choose to be your best friends. And her heroes....Oh my! They are strong, handsome, sexy alpha males who know what they want and have no problem going after it. You know, the kind of man every girl dreams of marrying. Sigh..... Taiden skillfully combines all these elements into a fast-paced, fun-filled paranormal tale filled to the brim with adventure, humor, romance and some good old steamy dreamy sex! So, now you know why I love Milly Taiden! If you're feeling down, depressed, sad, out of sorts or even if you're not - read a Milly Taiden book and I promise, by the time you finish, you'll feel better! There's nothing better than putting on my favorite, fuzzy robe and kicking back with Milly(one of her books) with a cup of hot cocoa or a nice glass of wine. Yep, that's the good life!Beautiful, curvaceous Charlotte Marzan may be a successful new author but she's definitely in a rut. It's been a whole year since she finally ended her seven year disastrous marriage and she still has no man in her life, not even a single prospect in sight. Men may not be fond of her curves but she's happy with her body, just not with her life. And to make matters worse, her best friend Bella has left to travel to another planet with her employer, Gerri Wilder. Wait - What? Oh yes, I did say another planet but don't tell anyone - it's a secret. And now Gerri shows up on her doorstep telling her that Bella won't be returning because she's getting married to an alien lion shifter who is the King of Aurora and Bella is becoming the Queen. Huh? And she's pregnant! Oh my! But it gets better! Bella wants Charlotte to find her a wedding dress and accompany Gerri back to Aurora, a planet filled with hot, hunky shifter males. Oh my lordy! Did I forget to mention that most of them are looking for mates??? Did I also forget to mention that Gerri wants to add Charlotte to her client list??? Oh my! What's a curvy girl to do??? Why put her furniture in storage and travel to another planet, of course!Sexy white wolves Brecc and Eros, Alpha and Omega of the Ice Pack on planet Nova Aurora, are quickly running out of time. They desperately need to find their mate to complete their triad and it needs to be now! If they don't locate her soon, the Elders of their pack will choose someone for them and they will be bound by honor to accept the Elders' choice whether they like it or not. Oh no! What can they do??? Never fear, Gerri's here and she's always up for the challenge! It's a wild ride to planet Aurora so buckle up my lovelies! Here we go again! Beautiful, curvy heroine-check! Two hot, handsome wolves-check! A pregnant best friend getting married on another planet-check! A sweet little dragon in need of a friend-check! A handsome, hunky dragon who is also in need of a mate-check! Adventure, an old feud and a little drama-check! Heated attraction, fiery passion and sweet romance-you bet! Oh, and did I mention a steamy, dreamy menage a trois-Oh yes, that too! Get ready! Get set! Let's get it on! Although this is a standalone alone novella with a very happy ever after ending, I would highly recommend reading every single book in this series. Fabulous entertainment and an awesome read!

Title: Dangerous WeeksSeries: Alpha Billionaire Romance SeriesDesignation: Book Seven of Multi-Installment Serial, NOT a StandaloneAuthor: Sarah J BrooksReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: FIVE DELIGHTFULLY ENTERTAINING STARS *****Love it! Dangerous Weeks is the seventh riveting installment of Sarah J Brooks' seductive new serial and I must say, I'm totally captivated. This is a serialized story so if you haven't read the previous books in the series, PLEASE STOP HERE. Okay, I realize that multi-installment serials may not be for everyone but what can I say, I love them. And Sarah Brooks just got my attention! This is my first time reading anything written by Brooks but I can say with absolute certainty, it won't be my last. I am so hooked on this series! I love the concept of this story:  a strong female lead with BRAINS. She's not only beautiful but intelligent as well and the icing on the cake: she has a mind of her own. Of course, we all love a handsome alpha male lead and love them all the more when they're charming and intelligent. And let's not forget - filthy rich! Who can resist that combination??? The story is exciting, sensual, arousing, well crafted, suspenseful and completely held my attention. Once I started reading, it was easy to immerse myself in the story and I wanted more. The narrative is exceptionally well written in the first person with his, his and her points of view, which I love. Yep, I said his twice and that wasn't a mistake. There are now two men weighing in with their take on the events as they happen. That's all I can say without giving too much away but what I can say is this - I love it! I believe this adds to the depth and complexity of the story and definitely gives us a better understanding of the characters, their feelings and motivations. The dialogue is smart, snappy, easy to follow and flows effortlessly. And now for the best part, the characters. They are fascinating, captivating, intriguing, engaging and relatable. The chemistry between the three main characters is convincing and at times, quite perplexing but in a good way. Quite simply, it is off the charts sexy and thrilling! Brooks skillfully crafts these elements into a fabulously entertaining contemporary romance  with a twist. What kind of twist, you ask? Well, it's a little too early to tell but I strongly suspect that we will have a little mystery and suspense in the near future. (And we most definitely do!) And please forgive me for being crass, but we didn't have to wait until halfway through the book for the mind-blowing sex! Oh no, Brooks rewarded us in the very first installment and gave us a little taste of how well suited these characters are for each other. I can hardly wait to read the next installment!Beautiful graduate student Becka Jasper is definitely on her way to a very promising and successful career. She's had to work hard for everything she has and intends to work even harder to get what she wants. When Oliver Weeks, CEO of Neuotova is invited to speak as a guest lecturer by Dr Evans, Becka's professor/advisor/mentor, she is able to snag an interview for an internship with Oliver Weeks, CEO of Neuotova, a major food research corporation. But Becka is immediately thrown off her game when she first sets eyes on Oliver Weeks and is more than just a little attracted to him. She immediately feels the chemistry between them and is conflicted over her decision to seek a job with the handsome, charismatic CEO. And it seems Oliver Weeks may be attracted to her as well.  Oh my!Billionaire Oliver Weeks has worked long and hard to achieve his success. The only area in which he hasn't been successful is his personal life. He works hard but plays little and very seldom has time for a relationship with the fairer sex. Most of his dates are arranged by his personal assistant and never the same woman. He has no interest in love or developing feelings for anyone - until now. One look at Becka Jasper is all it takes for alpha male Oliver to know that he wants her and not just as an intern in his lab. She's not only beautiful but she's also brilliant. He wants her in his life as well as his bed and he's not accustomed to being told no. Oliver Weeks always gets what he wants and he wants Becka. Oh my! Will Oliver be able to convince Becka to accept his offer - both of them??? Hmm...I wonder???Book Two:Becka has accepted Oliver's requests for several dates and their chemistry is off the charts but she's still conflicted over accepting an internship with his company while having a personal relationship with the handsome CEO. She has little time to consider her dilemma when she's broadsided with some devastating news. Becka and Dr Evans have spent countless time and much effort on a special research project for Protame, a healthy replacement for the artificial sweetener Aspartame. Becka has worked tirelessly on this project and has also chosen it as the subject as her dissertation. The university has suffered budget cutbacks and as a result, they have lost funding for their project. Oh no! What will she do? Maybe she should tell Oliver. Will Oliver be able to help??? Oliver is more determined than ever to have the beautiful Becka in his bed and in his lab. And he's not above a little scheming and manipulation to get what he wants. But let's not forget, Becka has a mind of her own and may have a few surprises in store for the wealthy determined billionaire! It's a battle of wills and both are determined to get what they want but will it be each other??? Or are there other secrets and motivations at play? Hmm... I wonder???Book Three:Oliver weeks did indeed help the lovely Becka and donated the money anonymously to the University to fund her Protame project and of course he has his own selfish reasons. He wants Becka and if that means making her feel somewhat indebted to him, then so be it. He's certainly not above using every dirty trick in the book to get what he wants but he certainly never expected her proclamation of never mixing business with pleasure. She's refused to sleep with him if she accepts the position at Neuotova! Huh? Oh yes, she definitely laid the law down to him. But when had he ever allowed a little thing like an emphatic no to ever stop him from getting what he wants? Never! He'll do whatever it takes; he's determined to have the beautiful, intelligent Becka?Becka knows it was Oliver that donated the money but does finally agrees to accept the internship with Neuotova, but she has a caveat of her own. If she accepts the internship as a paid position, she will be unable continue her personal relationship with Oliver. What? Nope, her conscience won't allow it. She will not allow a personal relationship to compromise her work ethics. Or will she? While doing some research on Oliver and his company, Becka uncovers some very disturbing allegations against Oliver and his company Neuotova, allegations charging animal cruelty by the use use of animals in their research, experimentation and testing. Huh? Becka is a researcher after all so who better to investigate? Becka is invited by her advisor Dr Evans to teach a Food Science Ethics class and at her very first class she meets student Ethan Hernandez who makes some serious charges regarding the use of animal testing against Neuotova. But are they true or simply conjecture and who is Ethan Hernandez? There's only one way to discover the truth and if it means more research into company files, then that's a chance she's willing to take. She just hadn't expected a perfect opportunity to fall into her lap when Oliver offers her a job as his assistant and a two week working vacation to Italy. Huh? Oh my! Can she work so closely with him and still be objective? I think not!Book Four:Apparently, Becka can't remain objective, not when Oliver insists on whisking her away to Italy for a working vacation with lots of shopping, romantic dinners and lots and lots of dreamy sex. Oh my! But nothing can last forever and so they must return home to their lives which for Becka includes discovering the truth about Oliver. Becka has received an email from Ethan promising absolute proof of his accusations against Oliver. Becka  reveals this information to Oliver but she now must decide whether to meet with Ethan. But Ethan has decided to turn up the heat, not only in his effort to turn Becka against Oliver but also to pursue her for himself as well. What? Becka is now caught in the middle of the two powerful men and has no idea which one to believe. And the latest revelation from Oliver about Ethan has her even more confused! Talk about dropping a bomb! Oh my glory! I never saw that one coming! So, what's a girl to do when two handsome, wealthy men are both supposedly vying for her affection? Sleep with one and kiss the other??? Oh my!Book Five:After agreeing to a meeting with Ethan and sharing a mind-blowing kiss with him, Becka comes to the sudden realization that she's actually attracted to both handsome men but how is that even possible? How can she be attracted to both Oliver and Ethan when obviously one of the men is lying to her? But who is lying and who is telling the truth? If she's to believe the documents Ethan has shown her, then Oliver is paying Ethan to guarantee his silence, therefore Oliver is not being honest. Or Ethan is blackmailing Oliver and extorting money but for what reason? Documents can be forged, right? Oliver has become an important part of her life but just what is her relationship with him? Does he truly care about her and her welfare? Is she is his girlfriend or merely flavor of the month? And to further complicate the situation, it now seems that Ethan wants Becka for himself and intends to steal her away from Oliver. Oh my! Ethan doesn't give Becka long to contemplate her questions. The morning after their impromptu kiss, Ethan unexpectedly arrives at Neuotova demanding to see Oliver and then..... immediately envelops her in his arms and crushes her with a hot smoldering kiss just as Oliver is opening his office door! OMG! Oliver goes ballistic and Ethan retaliates. Allegations, threats and insults are hurled by each and it seems they may come to blows. What a nightmare! (Or is it? Hmm...What woman doesn't want two hot as heck billionaires fighting over her? But is it really her they're fighting over?) Apparently both men have been less than forthright with Becka. Each has lied to her and kept a shocking secret. But Oliver just let the cat out of the bag! Oh my goodness! Oliver is determined to keep Becka no matter the cost but that Ethan is such a devilishly naughty boy! After all, what's a little deceit, betrayal, blackmail and extortion among ......I'll still never tell!Book Six:After discovering the secret of Oliver and Ethan's relationship, Becka is determined to leave her troubles behind, at least for the weekend. She needs time to think and that means time away from both Oliver and Ethan. She and Lisa, her best friend and roommate, take a break to have a little fun but Becka's merrymaking is constantly interrupted by thoughts of Oliver. After a wild night partying, Becka tries to contact Oliver but his phone is answered by none other than Ethan! Ethan? Oh my goodness! And when Becka demands to know what's going on, Ethan refuses to explain, insisting that if she wants to know, she must immediately come to Oliver's home. What the heck? Why is Ethan at Oliver's home and where is Oliver?Book Seven:Ethan is in full seduction mode and plans to have Becka in his arms and in his bed. Well, actually it would be Oliver's bed since it's in his house but at this point, he doesn't really care. Oliver's not here but he is and he wants Becka. He's never wanted a woman so much in his entire life. So what if he had to tell a little lie to get her here! All's fair in love and war!Becka finds herself succumbing to Ethan's charm but who could blame her? He's smokin' hot and for some reason, she feels inexplicably drawn to both men. Oliver has disappeared again without even as much as a goodbye much less an explanation so why should she feel guilty about being with Ethan in Oliver's home? Maybe she's misjudged Ethan after all or so she thinks until she finds blood in the wine cellar. It must be Oliver's blood. Is Oliver still alive and if so, where is he? Oh my! Surely Ethan would never harm Oliver, would he? After all, they are former business partners and ....... Nope, I'll still never tell! But I will say this....Ethan has certainly stepped up his game! But will Becka fall for it??? Secrets and lies are revealed as the suspense continues to build! Who should Becka trust??? No spoilers from me but I will say this....Buckle up and hang on! It's one heck of a great ride! Beautiful intelligent grad student with a mind of her own-check! Handsome alpha male billionaire who refuses to take no for an answer-check! Wealthy, charismatic accuser intent on destroying his ??????-check! No Spoilers! Lies, deceit, betrayal, blackmail, extortion and some very serious allegations accusing animal abuse, cruelty and experimentation-check! A little mystery, suspense and a few secrets-check!  Heated attraction, fiery passion, instant chemistry and steamy dreamy sex-you bet! That and a whole lot more! Fabulous entertainment and an awesome read!

Title: Her Dragon's SoulSeries: Dragon GuardDesignation: Book Nine, Can Be Read As StandaloneAuthor: Julia MillsReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: Five Heartwarming Stars******* Originally Published As Part Of Shifters Gone Alpha Box SetJulia Mills has once again captured our hearts with Her Dragon's Soul, the ninth and most recent release in her  spellbinding Dragon Guard Series. I became a diehard fan last year after reading the first book of the series, Her Dragon to Slay and now, like so many others, I anxiously await each new release. I originally read this story when it was first released in the Shifters Gone Alpha Bundle several months ago. In fact, I loved it so much that I wanted to share my thoughts on this story with you, and NO, I did NOT receive a free copy of this book in exchange for my review. I just love Mills' work, so I read them using the Kindle Unlimited program. These books can be read as standalone novellas but in order to gain maximum enjoyment from the story, I would highly recommend reading the books in order. You will never regret it! Mills never fails to tease, titillate and tantalize her readers with an exceptionally well developed, well crafted and well written paranormal tale filled to the brim with heart-stopping danger, heart-pounding adventure, spine-tingling suspense, heartbreaking angst and sweet, sensual romance. Sigh.......So dreamy! The heroes are always strong, brave, kind, loyal, handsome and most definitely swoonworthy while the heroines are smart, fierce, courageous, independent, dedicated and beautiful. These characters are not only faithful to their mates but are also committed to their friends, family and their cause. These dragon shifters are, quite literally, moden day Arthurian knights protecting the world from evil.This story features guardsman Liam Drennan from the Golden Fire clan and Hannah McKennon, a lovely white witch who has been victimized by an evil wizard. Liam accompanies Jace, his friend and fellow guardsman, to seek help from the Blue Thunder clan to rescue his mate Melanie from her grandfather, the Grand Draoi of the Dorcha, a coven of wizards and witches who worship demons. During the rescue Liam discovers that Melanie's best friend and fellow witch, Hannah, is his true mate, the one the universe created just for him. Oh my! Love is in the air - again! With the combined efforts of the Golden Fire and Blue Thunder clans, the dragon shifters once again are victorious and manage to save Melanie but at what cost? Cleland, the Grand Draoi somehow escapes but not before he claims another victim. It seems that he still has a few aces up his sleeve and Hannah has become an unknowing pawn in his evil machinations. Will Jace be able to save Hannah before it's too late??? Maybe, but just who will save Jace??? Oh my goodness! Buckle up my lovelies! Here we go again! Handsome, courageous dragon shifter-check! Beautiful white witch-check! Adventure, danger and an evil wizard-check! Heartbreaking angst and heartwarming romance-you bet! That and a whole lot more! I love it! I can hardly wait for the next story in the Dragon Guard Series!

Title: Secrets and LiesSeries: The Diamond ClubDesignation: Book Five of a Multi-Installment Serial, NOT a Standalone,Author: Ellie Danes and Lily KnightReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: FIVE SEXY STARS *****The Diamond Club: Secrets and Lies is the latest fabulous series from two of my favorite new authors, Ellie Danes and Lily Knight. This is my first time reading a collaboration between these two very gifted authors but mixing their unique blend of talents makes this series even more appealing. Please be advised, this is a five part multi-installment serial and NOT a standalone read. Each installment contains 30 to 40 pages and the first four do end with a cliffhanger. This is the fifth and final installment so if you haven't read the previous four books in the series, PLEASE STOP HERE. I realize this may not be everyone's cup of tea, but what can I say - I love a great serial. They're always a quick read and I get lots of variety since it enables me to read more stories; plus, I do love a great cliffhanger! The story is original, unique, realistic, fast-paced, exciting and seductive. The narrative is well written in the first person with his and her points of view. The dialogue is smart, snappy, well executed and flows naturally. The characters are captivating, intriguing, engaging, sexy and relatable. I immediately fell in love with the male and female protagonist of the story and quickly became completely vested in the lives of both characters. I found the book to be well developed, well written, well edited, moves at a quick but comfortable pace and is very pleasurable to read. This is multi-installment serial and NOT a standalone read. If you haven't read the previous books in the series, please STOP here.Book One:Twenty-six year old waitress and aspiring author, Alicia Valerio is having a typical day working at Afternoon Delight, a local, upscale, beach side bistro and neighborhood landmark - or was until handsome, charismatic, billionaire Ryan Jensen walks in and is seated in her section. Now it seems she's all thumbs and has two left feet. So, Alicia is more than just a little surprised when he introduces himself and after only a short conversation, a few choice curse words and a very unpleasant accident resulting in Ryan being soaked with his own beer, he asks her for a date - for today. That's right! He wants her to take off work and be his date for a small party on his boat which turns out to be a yacht! Oh my! And, the icing on the cake - he offers to pay her a thousand dollars for her to be his plus one. Huh? Surely, this handsome guy can get anyone he wants. If there is a catch, Alicia doesn't care as long as she gets paid! She's had her degree for three years but still working at Afternoon Delight while waiting for her writing career to take-off so she can publish her great debut novel. Nothing wrong with dreaming, right? Needless to say, she can use all the money she can get at this point. It takes everything she makes just to survive living on her own. What's a girl to do? Why accept, of course!Billionaire Bachelor Ryan Jensen has it all. Wealth, charm and good looks. Well, he almost has it all. What he doesn't have is a date for the party he's hosting this afternoon and evening on his yacht. The blind date arranged by his business partner just called and cancelled. That is so not cool! He hasn't had a steady girlfriend since he had been dumped a few years ago by Isabella for one of his business competitors. Apparently his friends had never really liked her and had seen her for the opportunist she really was. So, what's a handsome billionaire to do when he needs a date for his own party? Why ask his beautiful, smokin' hot waitress of course! Yeah, that one - the one that just spilled beer in his lap. But, will she be his plus one and agree to keep their payment terms a secret? We'll see!Book Two:Yes, Alicia does agree to be Ryan's plus one for the party on his yacht for $1000.00. The party went well and his date with Alicia after everyone returns to his home was spectacular. Ryan has never been as attracted to a women as he is to Alicia. Even his friends seemed to really like her and that is a must if he wants to be involved with her. Unfortunately, a drunken Reena, one of the members of his group, let the cat out of the bag about their "club" and now Alicia wants to know what the "club" is all about. While in college, Ryan, Justin, Roger and Dylan formed their own exclusive, secret club. They called it the Diamond Club. Originally, it was just the guys seeking more than just simple fun; they wanted to experience wild, heart-pounding adventure with thrills, chills and life-threatening, death-defying activities. It gave them a high like nothing else. They had become adrenaline junkies in need of extreme danger for a fix. But as time passed, the guys eventually agreed to add their girlfriends, Tammy, Lori and Reena. Fortunately, Ryan's former girlfriend, Isabella, had never been invited to join the club. Apparently everyone but Ryan had seen her for the opportunist she turned out to be. The guys all contribute equally to the club for their trips and expenses and the women have to have their own money to kick in for their entertainment and shopping which has never been a problem until now - until Alicia. Everyone else has money to burn and the rule is that the guys cannot pay for their girlfriends, but obviously Alicia doesn't have the kind of money needed to be a member of The Diamond Club. It was only supposed to be a one and done deal with Alicia but he can't stop thinking about her. Everything reminds him of Alicia and his thoughts seems to always somehow revert back to her. And with a very drunk Reena having let it slip about their club, he will either have to continue to lie to Alicia if he wants to continue seeing her or he could tell her the truth and still risk losing her. She may be just a waitress he met randomly but he really likes her. Everything about her appeals to him - not just her hot body but also her personality, her style and her confidence. She's the whole package and totally unlike anyone he's ever dated. But liking her isn't the problem. It's how well she can get along with his friends in the club, especially the women. There's also the little fact that she doesn't have access to the funds required to be a member of the club. And of course, the little matter of offering to pay her for their first date is something he would never want his friends to discover. What would they think of her then? Could she fit in with his friends? Would she even want to once he tells her the truth? What's a guy do do?Alicia dreams of becoming a successful author but her agent has shot down every suggestion she's submitted for publication and her first two book attempts were rejected by every publisher she contacted. She's completely run out of ideas but while updating the blog she started online five years ago, Waiting In My Tower, she suddenly has a thought. What if she writes an article for her blog about her surreal experience meeting Ryan and his friends. It could be essentially a blog within a blog and she could name it The Diamond Club Diaries. If by some chance they continue to see each other, she could do a weekly update all about the lives of the rich and famous and how they spend their money and their time. She would change all the names, of course, but still, it just might attract more readers and traffic to her blog which in turn would generate enough attention that may lead to a legitimate job offer as a writer. Besides, Ryan and his friends would never read her blog, would they? Hmm... Sounds like a disaster waiting to happen to me! So, with her decision made, she would continue to see Ryan but only if he reveals the truth about the club. But will he want to continue to see her? After all, she's not wealthy; she's just an ordinary, everyday waitress. Hmm...I wonder?Book Three:Yes, it seems Ryan does want the lovely Alicia. In fact, he wants her so much that he's willing to reveal all the juicy details about the Diamond Club. He's even invited her to go with the group on a white water rafting trip this weekend but Alicia has her doubts about wanting to belong to this group of billionaire boys with their toys and their "mean girl" wealthy girlfriends. How could a girl who waits tables ever fit in with Ryan and his friends? But she really likes Ryan and decides to give a try. Besides, if it doesn't work out, she will at least have some extra cash and a great story out of the deal. No harm, no foul, right? But is that all Alicia really wants? Unfortunately, Ryan's friends don't make it easy for Alicia and the girls bring out the claws, especially one in particular. For some reason, Tammy seems to know more than she pretends and is determined to turn everyone against Alicia and destroy any hope of her having a relationship with Ryan. What is this girl's problem? The outcome of the weekend may very well determine whether Ryan and Alicia have any hope of a future together but Ryan finally begins to see just how dysfunctional he and his friends have become but is it too little, too late? Will his realization come in time to save his possible future with Alicia?Book Four:Although the whitewater rafting weekend outing may have been a failure for Alicia's relationship with the women of the club, it seems to be very much a success for the relationship developing between her and Ryan. Alicia has continued her blog posts for her Diamond Club Diaries and it has begun to generate a lot of attention. More and more people have begun to leave positive comments and her shares have been growing exponentially with even her agent weighing in with glowing feedback. With a little luck, she just may become the latest blogging phenomenon! And that could very well mean job offers as a writer and possibly even a book deal! That would be a good thing, right? It could very well jump-start her career. Oh my! But it may also destroy her relationship with Ryan! Oh no! But she never used real names in her blog so no one would ever know the truth, right? Unless Tammy discovers her blog.....but that could never happen, right??? Wrong! What's a girl to do???After a group date turns into a disaster at a local club as a result of Justin trying to force his attentions on Alicia, Ryan comes to the realization that somewhere during the pretense with Alicia, he has begun to have real feelings for her. When he discovered Justin trying to seduce Alicia, it made him see red! He wanted to kill Justin! He loves Alicia but does she care for him as well? Or is she only dating him for the money? After Tammy's recent declaration that she knows Ryan is paying Alicia to be his girlfriend just like he did in college, Ryan has become even more concerned that someone may discover the truth and if this were to ever become public, it would surely destroy him and his company, Solas Enterprises. In a few weeks, he's hosting a huge gala to hopefully attract more investors and possibly another business partner. He can't afford any bad press, especially concerning the Diamond Club and his personal life with Alicia. Obviously, no woman would ever want to be publicly outed as a prostitute so Ryan feels safe in assuming that Alicia would never disclose their secret. Would she??? Oh my goodness!Book Five:During a disastrous group date at a local nightclub where Justin quite literally tries to rape Alicia, the crap totally hits the fan! Alicia's blog has not only been discovered but has also been revealed by Justin's girlfriend, rich-bitch Tammy. Ryan now knows that Alicia has been secretly chronicling the activities of the Diamond Club with a running commentary on her blog and as a result, his reputation and company may now be at risk. So, what's a slightly immature and reckless billionaire to do??? Why confront the woman he loves and end their relationship, of course! Oh no! oh yes! But after a near brush with death, Ryan finally realizes there are some things in life that money can't buy and one of those things is the love of a good women. But will his self discovery be too little too late??? Will Alicia finally realize there are more important things in life than becoming successful as a writer??? I wonder??? No spoilers from me but I will say this....Beautiful aspiring writer working as a waitress-check! Handsome billionaire in need of a date-check! A yacht, a party, a secret club, a blog, a mean girl, betrayal, a few secrets and lies-check! Instant attraction, explosive chemistry and seductive romance-you bet! That and a whole lot more! Fabulous entertainment and an awesome read!

Title: Engaged to the Vampire TwinsDesignation: Book Ten of Multi-Installment Serial, NOT A STANDALONE STORY, DOES INCLUDE CLIFFHANGERAuthor: Rosette BolterMy Rating: Four Entertaining Stars ****Reading Platform: Kindle Unlimited**** After having read the first ten installments of Engaged to the Vampire Twins, I would like to say to anyone currently reading this serial, unless you've read the following serials by Rosette Bolter, Shared by the Dragon Clan, Badass Dragons and Worshiped by the Bear Kings, you may find yourself more than a little lost at this point in the book. Ms Bolter has now begun to heavily populate this story with characters, backstories and plots from her three aforementioned serials. If you've already read them, you should be able to follow this story. If not, I would highly recommend reading them first and then come back to this series. If you haven't at least read the first nine installments of Engaged to the Vampire Twin, PLEASE STOP HERE.This is the tenth installment of Rosette Bolter's dark and mysterious series, Engaged To The Vampire Twins. And yes, this is a serial with cliffhangers just like your favorite TV shows. Remember Dara Mills from Bolter's Worshiped By The Bear Kings serial? Well, she's back and now has her own series. The sassy, snarky Dara is now trying to move on with her life and put the murder of her brother, Jake behind her. It has been a very difficult year since his death and Dara has made quite a few changes. She has left her old boyfriend Dennis Whiley behind, now has her own apartment and a new job at a prestigious law firm, Hall and Evans. The past has taken quite a toll on Dara. She is no longer the social butterfly of her wild youth but is instead, somewhat of a recluse. Having witnessed the strange world of the paranormal and experienced the danger and death first hand, she no longer desires the exposure to anything supernatural. So when an unexpected package mysteriously appears at her door from the wealthy entrepreneur, Brandon Drake, she is more than a little puzzled. Inside the package is a dress and a note telling her that he's waiting for her downstairs in his limo. She's never even met the man and certainly has no intention of getting into his limo or ever dating him. What the heck? But never say never! Because as it turns out, it wasn't Brandan, it was his psychotic twin brother, Brendan and they are both vampires! Huh? And to make matters worse, Brendan has just kidnapped Dara - AGAIN! What the heck? Dara has been taken to Castle Drake on a secluded island where she is stripped naked and chained in a dank basement by the twins' sister, Madeline Drake. What? Dara soon discovers that there are other girls on the island and they are here to compete against each other to become the wife of Brandan and Brendan Drake! What the holy heck? But the situation gets even worse when Brandan is mortally wounded by his own brother and sister and then kicked off the roof of Drake Castle. His own twin has tried to kill him! What? Talk about an evil twin! Will Dara manage another escape? Will Brandan survive his injuries? I will give you one little tidbit. Guess who shows up to lend a gun-toting hand? Why Dara's old flame, Dennis Whiley, of course! I know ya'll remember Dennis from Bolter's Worshiped by the Bear Kings Series and he also had a small part in Shared by the Dragon Clan Series. And now, Dara is Jasmine and Jasmine is Dara. Huh? How in the name of the goddess did that happen? Brandon survived his injuries and is working with Brendan again but who will the brothers believe??? The woman who looks like Dara or the one who looks Jasmine??? And to add even more spice to this explosive cocktail, Brandon is Brendan, no that's not right - Brandan is pretending to be Brendan - again! Great Caesar's ghost, what a cluster fluster! I bet you thought I was going to say something else, didn't you! Can Dara somehow convince the brothers that she's not Jasmine? Will Brandan kill his love Dara, thinking she's really Jasmine? And talk about the mother of all cliffhanger endings! What a heart pounding plot twist! I never saw that one coming! OMG! I almost fell out of my chair! And what in the world has happened to Jasmine Whiley aka Countess Madeline aka who in the world knows who else she is? How in the world did Jasmine and the Bear Kings get involved in this? Is Jasmine really doing all these terrible things or could someone be impersonating Jasmine as well? And what is the connection between the vampire twins and Jet Strongarm? And now, Master Synrith has mysteriously reappeared along with Hades of the Destair, sisters Cheryl and Sophie Thames, evil witch/vampiress Hylee Chandra, lion-shifter Lynette Thistle, panther-shifter Gaspar Travis, Quraal, Professor Hess the Mage, Jasmine's brother Jake and Lady Glowshark with her time portal! And what in the world is Dennis up to??? What the heck? Who is the real puppet master in this dark and evil cabal? Well, it's always darkest before the dawn but the sun is peeking above the horizon. In Book Nine we finally received a glimpse behind the veil shrouding the puzzling change in behavior of Jasmine Whiley! Jasmine/Hylee has been desperately trying to set right her own timeline by manipulating past and future people and events, and apparently doesn't care who gets hurt in the process! But at least we finally discover who is initially responsible for Jasmine's sudden change from good to evil and why. And poor Dara! She's also traveled to the past and is trying to correct her timeline to save her brother Jake. She's like a cat with nine lives but keeps losing every one of them!  Even with a head start and a case filled with money, Dara just can't seem to save herself or anyone else! Hylee/Jasmine/Madeline who is now wearing the face of Dara may finally have her revenge. After all, revenge is always best served cold and her heart is absolutely frigid! She is determined to make the Drake twins suffer for the pain they inflicted upon her and her....??? I'll never tell! But having the twins murder their sweet Dara is a great start! Oh my lordy! Buckle up my lovelies! This is one heck of a ride! The story is exciting, intriguing, complex, suspenseful, original and imaginative. The characters are fascinating and captivating. I was hooked from page one and I'm still hooked! No spoilers from me but I will say this.... Handsome, sexy twin vampires-check! Beautiful human heroine-check! Danger, spellbinding drama, edge of your seat suspense, heinous enemies with unknown agendas, time travel and plot twists galore-you bet! There are so many mind-blowing, head-spinning plot twists that I'm suffering from whiplash!  Great balls of fire! There are a few problems but overall, good job! If you want a complex plot driven story with unexpected twists at every turn, then this is the series for you! One thing is certain - Rosette Bolter does have one heck of an imagination! Don't blink and don't doze! You don't want to miss anything! This book will definitely keep you on your toes! My only criticism is it's becoming somewhat repetitive so hopefully the end will come soon.

Title: Her Dragon's HeartSeries: Dragon GuardDesignation: Book Eight of Series, Can Be Read As StandaloneAuthor: Julia MillsReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: FIVE DRAGO-LICIOUS STARS*****Wow! The very talented Julia Mills has stolen our hearts once again with Her Dragon's Heart, the eighth riveting release in her bestselling mega-hit Dragon Guard Series. Like many of her other loyal fans, I have followed this series since the very beginning and can't seem to get enough of the wonderful adventures of the super sexy Dragon Guard. I love it! Although this book can be read as a standalone, I would highly recommend reading the books in order. You'll never regret it but you may just find that you also have become a die-hard Julia Mills fan! The story is exciting, thrilling, fast-paced, action-packed, suspenseful, romantic and seductive. And did I say sexy? No? Well, it's seriously sexy!!! The dialogue flows effortlessly and the narrative is exceptionally well written in the third person with multiple points of view. There were a few errors that could be easily corrected with a good edit but nothing that detracted from the story. The characters are fascinating, captivating, engaging and endearing. The heroes are brave, loyal, swoon-worthy alpha males and the heroines are beautiful, intelligent, courageous and fiercely independent females. Each book features a different dragon guardsman finding his true mate, the one woman the universe made just for him. In this story, we have handsome dragon shifter, Jace MacQuaid of the Golden Fire Clan and his destined mate, lovely nurse and white witch Melanie Rose Whelan, who just happens to be the granddaughter of the Grand Draoi of the Dorcha, a coven of wizards and witches who worship demons. Oh my! Jace first met Melanie four months ago when he was first assigned to guard duty at the hospital but was hesitant to pull the trigger on a relationship with the beautiful nurse and now, he may be too late. Oh no! Jace had no clue of Melanie's true identity - until now and she's just been abducted by her malevolent grandfather and he has some very evil plans for his only granddaughter. Oh my goodness! Now, Jace will have to find and rescue her before he can propose! That is, after he tells her he's a dragon! Will Jace be able to find Melanie before it's too late??? I wonder??? What's a little magic, mayhem and a plot to rule the world among enemies??? Buckle up my lovelies! Here we go again! Handsome dragon shifter-check! Beautiful inexperienced white witch-check! Evil grandfather and coven of demon worshipers-check! Danger, drama, action, adventure, magic and evil machinations-check! Sweet romance and fated love-you bet! That and a whole lot more! Fabulous entertainment and an awesome read!

Echoes From The Past !!!Title: A Trail of EchoesSeries: A Shade of VampireDesignation: Book Eighteen of a Multi-Novel series, NOT a Standalone ReadAuthor: Bella ForrestGenre: Young Adult Paranormal RomanceReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: FIVE FANG-TABULOUS STARS *****Wow! Best-selling author Bella Forrest has dazzled her readers yet again with A Trail of Echoes, the eighteenth release in her spellbinding mega-hit series, A Shade of Vampire and she has totally left me breathless- again!
