Like thousands of my fellow Shaddicts, I've been hooked from the very first book of the series and now anxiously await each release. I simply can't get enough! I was turning the pages so fast, my Kindle Fire couldn't keep up! Just when I think there's no way this series can get any better - wham - Bella hits us with another knockout! Bella has surprised us all with another riveting adventure that curls our toes, makes our hearts pound and keeps us begging for more! This is a paranormal/supernatural/fantasy saga so unlike any other I've ever read. It is exciting, well crafted, original, unique, imaginative, thrilling, fast paced, riveting, action packed, mysterious, suspenseful, enchanting, heartbreaking, heartwarming, seductive and oh so romantic. Whew, what a mouthful, but these are only a few of the words that come to mind after reading this incredible chronicle of the Shade, its inhabitants and its enemies. Can you tell that I really love this story? The narrative is exceptionally well written in the first person with a multitude of alternating points of view. Each chapter is told by one of the characters which I feel gives so much more depth, intensity and perspective to the story and adds to the complexity and understanding of the characters. The dialogue is smart, exceptionally well executed, well edited and flows effortlessly. Although the story is compelling and the dialogue is exceptional, it's truly the magnificent, comprehensive cast of larger than life characters that makes the biggest impact. They are well developed, captivating, intriguing, engaging, endearing and quite literally, out of this world sexy! They explode from the page, grab your imagination, capture your heart and hold you totally enthralled from beginning to end. Forrest skillfully combines these elements to craft a stunningly brilliant masterpiece of paranormal romance filled to the brim with action, adventure, fantasy, mystery, suspense, magic, supernatural beings, love, passion, loyalty, heartbreak, hope and plot twists that will blow your mind.In Book Eighteen, we resume our story as Joseph Brunson, aka Ben Novak, and now half-blood, River Giovanno, embark together on a treacherous journey to seek answers after having miraculously escaped Jeramiah and his followers at the Oasis, but unfortunately are now being relentlessly pursued by the Hunters. Joseph has finally confessed to River his true identity as Ben Novak, Prince of the Shade. He also reveals the secret of the Shade and the possible hope it may hold for them both. Ben and River grow much closer as they struggle to make their arduous and danger-filled journey to Ben's island home. But as our two unlikely lovers and heroes struggle to survive, the residents of the Shade are also facing new enemies and new problems of their own. Simultaneously, Jeremiah is also learning Joseph's true identity as Ben Novak and surprisingly, this information comes from an unlikely and very unexpected source. There's a new player in town and her name is Queen Nuriya Nasiri. Oh my goodness! Important pieces to the puzzle are slowly revealed only to be replaced by even more perplexing questions. Oh my! No spoilers from me but I will say this......Handsome, guilt-stricken, newly turned vampire who can't control his bloodlust-check! Beautiful half-blood heroine who gets caught up in what she once thought to be only fantasy and fairy tales-check! A plethora of supernatural characters including vampires, werewolves, witches, dragons, ogres, hawks, djinn, mermaids, mermen and even a hellhound-you bet! Danger, drama, adventure, suspense, mind blowing plot twists and a dangerous new enemy-you bet! A possible romance for Ben and River-it's looking very probable!!! That and a whole lot more! I love it! I never tire of visiting my friends of 'The Shade'. It always feels like returning home. If you love heart-wrenching young adult paranormal romance, heartbreaking angst, tantalizing magic, out of this world fantasy, spine-tingling suspense, hold your breath action, malevolent enemies, evil machinations, unexpected plot twists and heart-pounding adventure, then you will surely enjoy A Shade of Vampire series. Buckle up my lovelies! It's another wild, wonderful and thrilling ride! Please keep in mind, this is a series - not a stand alone story and the books should be read in order of their release - and it does contain nail biting cliffhangers that will leave you on the edge of your seat panting for more - which I love! Bella always keeps us on our toes but lovingly rewards our patience with each new release. Well done, Bella, very well done! I can hardly wait to read what happens next with Derek, Sophia, Caleb, Rose, Ben, River, Claudia, Yuri, Vivienne, Xavier. Aiden and all the other wonderful residents of the Shade when the adventure continues in Book 19! And a few of our old favorites from the early books even make a return! Charmingly captivating, seriously sexy, powerfully compelling and delightfully entertaining!!!My Rating: FIVE DELIGHTFULLY ENTERTAINING STARS *****

Title: Strife Part SixSeries: The Strife SeriesDesignation: Book Six of a Multi-Installment Serial, Not A StandaloneAuthor: Sky CorganMy Rating: FIVE DELIGHTFULLY WICKED STARS *****Yowza! Sky Corgan has gone and done it again! And just what has she done, you ask? She's dazzled her readers with yet another riveting serial and what a sparkler it is! Strife is her latest offering and will be released in multiple installments so please be aware, there will be cliffhangers. Each book is a relatively quick read with only approximately 40 to 45 pages which makes it perfect for a quick break or lunchtime treat. Personally, I love the excitement and anticipation of a well written serial with a great oh my god cliffhanger and Sky Corgan is a master of her trade. She knows exactly how to tease, tantalize and titillate her reader for maximum effect in order to create the pinnacle of a wonderfully entertaining experience. Strife is an extremely well written dark and compelling romance with complex characters but what is most surprising in this story is the underlying element of humor which I find that I very much enjoy. The story is told in the first person by the two primary characters, Pepper Kimbrough and Dmitri Strife, with alternating his and her points of view by chapter which just happens to be my favorite style of storytelling. Although the story is classified as a dark romance, it's anything but gloomy. It's exciting, fast-paced, appealing, realistic, romantic and seductive. The characters as always shine brightly in Sky Corgan's work and these are no exception. They are fascinating, captivating, engaging, relatable, sexy as sin and sometimes quite humorous. Corgan skillfully combines these elements into an enticing and divinely entertaining experience for her readers.Book One: Pepper Kimbrough came to Hollywood to fulfill her dream of becoming an actress. That was Plan A. Unfortunately, Plan A hasn't worked out so well. Of course, neither has her life but she's managed to survive, albeit by the skin of her teeth. She may not be innocent and vulnerable but she's definitely desperate. And hence, her current predicament - down on her knees with her head in James Sumner's lap with her mouth on his.... well, you know where her mouth is. Yep, this is now her life and this is what loosely passes for a somewhat questionable interview for a job - or at least she hopes. No, life certainly isn't beautiful, not for people like her - at least not yet. Sometimes, it's as ugly as your own worst nightmares and this is definitely one of those times. The only question: Is Pepper strong enough to survive it??? The memories of her past say no but her determination and inner strength say yes. Now it's time for Plan B: Please this jerkwad Sumner, get the job as a call girl making $500.00 an hour, save her money, go to college, then become rich and famous. But is she really willing to sell her body as well as her soul to accomplish her dream and yet somehow, still hang on to her sanity? Or ultimately risk her sanity to fulfill her dream? She's been through worse and it's not forever, right? Right!? She can do this and stay sane; she could be a escort/call girl, couldn't she? It's actually rather ironic since she had actually grown up rich and now she's only one breath away from homeless and starving. This is all worth it, isn't it? With only $9.03 left to her name, it has to be. She no longer has a choice. Or does she???Rock Star Dmitri Strife has conquered the musical stage and now he's ready to conquer the big screen stage in Hollywood with his first starring role as Brodie Grant in the upcoming new movie, Master of Payback. He's just arrived and it's his first night in "tinsel town". His friend John is surprising him with a night on the town and it does turn out to be quite the shock. Instead of going to a club, John is taking him to a private brothel with beautiful babes galore, all willing to submit to his every desire. Oh my! But Dmitri has had his fill of endless nights of booze, never ending parties and meaningless sex with women always looking to use him as a means for fame and fortune. He doesn't wanted to be caught up in that nightmare again and almost leaves - until he sees her - the beautiful, blonde that wanders onto the balcony where he's hidden in the shadows. She looks so innocent and so sad. He can't help himself; he needs to know her name. But surprisingly when he approaches her, she doesn't seem to recognize him. He just won't tell her who he really is so he tells her his name is Brodie Grant, the name of his movie character, instead. This night may work out after all. Hmmm.... I wonder?????Book Two:Pepper, who has been given the moniker of Alexis by her boss James Sumner, spent her first night as an escort talking with Brodie/Dmitri and NOT having sex. Huh? Nope, no sex. During their night together, Pepper/Alexis confesses to Dmitri/Brodie that she was adopted but the day after graduating from high school, her parents kicked her out with only $700 and said they never wanted to see her again. What the heck? Pepper feels like a complete failure after not being able to seduce Dmitri/Brodie and begins to have serious doubts as to whether she can actually continue this job but unfortunately she's out of options so it's this or starve. But Pepper soon realizes that she may be in way over her head. Thirty five year old Dmitri Strife is very much looking forward to meeting his co-star, Marie Overton. It has long been his dream to meet and woo the beautiful sophisticated movie star and knows this is the perfect opportunity. Apparently she doesn't feel the same since she didn't even bother to show up for the cast luncheon so there will be no date tonight with Marie Overton. So, what's a handsome, successful heartthrob to do??? Request another night with Alexis/Pepper, of course!!! Oh my! And still, no sex! But strangely, Dmitri finds that he enjoys being with Alexis/Pepper and is drawn to beauty and her innocence and is somewhat puzzled by his feelings toward Alexis. He knows an association with her could be dangerous for his career but he can't seem to stop himself. He convinces himself that it's just the easy camaraderie he experiences with Alexis and nothing more.Book Three:Dmitri has started filming and finally meets his co-star but at first, Marie seems mildly interested in him. She leaves before he can ask her out. But is he still interested in her? Or would he rather spend time  with Pepper? Hmm...Is his interest due to sympathy for Pepper's plight or possibly or is it real friendship he feels for the lovely young Pepper? Or could it be something more??? But the feelings Pepper/Alexis feel for Dmitri are far from friendly. Pepper/Alexis enjoys her time spent with Dmitri and more than a little attracted to him. She hopes to see him again and a small thread of hope is born that maybe, he may just feel something for her other than physical desire. James informs her that Dmitri has indeed requested her company again for the night.  I wonder if Pepper/Alexis will be able to seduce Dmitri this time???  And yes, Pepper/Alexis now knows that Brodie lied to her about his identity and is really Dmitri Strife! Oh my goodness!Book Four:Dmitri finally has the chance to ask Marie Overton for a date - and she accepts. But the long awaited date falls short of his actual expectations. Despite their great on screen chemistry, Dmitri is just not feeling a real connection with Marie. It seems, all Dmitri can think about is Pepper. Yep, his thoughts are filled with everything Pepper. It's only been one night since they were last together but he wants to see her again. And it also seems that Dmitri may have finally realized that he wants to do so much more than just see her and be her friend. He wants the beautiful young Pepper but will she still be the same innocent escort? Or did she have a client last night? Dmitri doesn't want anyone else to have Pepper and he's shocked at his own self revelation. He wants to be the only man to touch her beautiful body. What's a rock star to do? Request another night with Pepper, of course! No matter the cost!  This is their third night together, so will they or won't they?Book Five:They will and they do! Oh my! And it was fabulous -  or at least it was until Pepper surrendering to temptation, took a sneak peek at Dmitri's phone and saw the text message from Marie Overton. Oh no! Oh yes! Another brittle piece of Pepper's already fragile heart shatters in her chest as she realizes that Dmitri is like all the other men she's ever known, a liar, a user, a player and never to be trusted. And her conclusion about Dmitri is certainly reinforced when she sees Dmitri and Marie Overton together at a club on the same night he has already arranged with James to have her for the evening but fails to show but leaves her a note feigning a business engagement. What? And the final nail in Dmitri's coffin is Marie kissing Dmitri - on the mouth! Oh no! Oh yes! What will Pepper do now? Will Pepper still want Dmitri after becoming aware of his relationship with Marie Overton? More importantly, what will Dmitri do now that he realizes he may not want Marie Overton after all. Marie Overton is certainly not the person he imagined her to be?Book Six:As Dmitri witnesses the look of betrayal and pain on Pepper's beautiful face as a result of Marie's possessive kiss, he realizes that Pepper cares so much more for him than she claims. And surprisingly, that fact pleases him but along with that revelation also comes the realization that he wants Pepper, not Marie Overton. He now also must admit that he is falling in love with the escort, Pepper Kimbrough. Pepper may refuse to admit the truth, but it's obvious that she needs him; but even worse, he needs her just as much if not more. Oh my! The publicity of being seen with an escort could destroy his career. Unfortunately, that doesn't discourage his need for Pepper. He just needs to talk this over with someone but who can he trust? His old friend, John, of course. You remember, the one who was responsible for him meeting Pepper. Oh no! That may not have been the best idea. And just why was that such a bad idea? Because after John encourages him to break things off with Pepper, he calls and books Pepper for himself! Oh my! What now Dmitri? How will he ever get Pepper to trust him again?After a confrontation with Dmitri, Pepper arrives at her job the next night only to discover from James that Dmitri has not requested her for another night but he has recommended her to John who has requested her services for the night. What? Oh my goodness! She is sickened by the thoughts of being with another man but everything Dmitri told her were lies! Just when she's ready to change her life, he betrays her - again! Can she continue to be an escort? Does she even want to???It seems Dmitri and Pepper both have a decision to make - an important one that will affect their careers, their lives and their futures. What does each truly want? Whom does each truly want? What will they decide? No spoilers from me but I will say this...Beautiful young woman who came to Hollywood to fulfill her dream of becoming an actress but has fallen on hard times and is now broke and almost homeless-check! Handsome rock star who is tired of his life as a famous musician and has come to Hollywood for his first starring role in a movie-check! An unexpected meeting of two lost souls-check! Lies, deceit and betrayal-check! Heated attraction, fiery passion, heartbreaking angst, sweet romance and dreamy sex-you bet! That and a whole lot more! Fabulous entertainment and an awesome read! I can hardly wait for the next installment!Complimentary copy received in exchange for an honest review.

Title: Fearful WeeksSeries: Alpha Billionaire Romance SeriesDesignation: Book Six of Multi-Installment Serial, NOT a StandaloneAuthor: Sarah J BrooksReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: FIVE DELIGHTFULLY ENTERTAINING STARS *****Love it! Fearful Weeks is the sixth riveting installment of Sarah J Brooks' seductive new serial and I must say, I'm totally captivated. This is a serialized story so if you haven't read the previous books in the series, PLEASE STOP HERE. Okay, I realize that multi-installment serials may not be for everyone but what can I say, I love them. And Sarah Brooks just got my attention! This is my first time reading anything written by Brooks but I can say with absolute certainty, it won't be my last. I am so hooked on this series! I love the concept of this story:  a strong female lead with BRAINS. She's not only beautiful but intelligent as well and the icing on the cake: she has a mind of her own. Of course, we all love a handsome alpha male lead and love them all the more when they're charming and intelligent. And let's not forget - filthy rich! Who can resist that combination??? The story is exciting, sensual, arousing, well crafted, suspenseful and completely held my attention. Once I started reading, it was easy to immerse myself in the story and I wanted more. The narrative is exceptionally well written in the first person with his, his and her points of view, which I love. Yep, I said his twice and that wasn't a mistake. There are now two men weighing in with their take on the events as they happen. That's all I can say without giving too much away but what I can say is this - I love it! I believe this adds to the depth and complexity of the story and definitely gives us a better understanding of the characters, their feelings and motivations. The dialogue is smart, snappy, easy to follow and flows effortlessly. And now for the best part, the characters. They are fascinating, captivating, intriguing, engaging and relatable. The chemistry between the three main characters is convincing and at times, quite perplexing but in a good way. Quite simply, it is off the charts sexy and thrilling! Brooks skillfully crafts these elements into a fabulously entertaining contemporary romance  with a twist. What kind of twist, you ask? Well, it's a little too early to tell but I strongly suspect that we will have a little mystery and suspense in the near future. (And we most definitely do!) And please forgive me for being crass, but we didn't have to wait until halfway through the book for the mind-blowing sex! Oh no, Brooks rewarded us in the very first installment and gave us a little taste of how well suited these characters are for each other. I can hardly wait to read the next installment!Beautiful graduate student Becka Jasper is definitely on her way to a very promising and successful career. She's had to work hard for everything she has and intends to work even harder to get what she wants. When Oliver Weeks, CEO of Neuotova is invited to speak as a guest lecturer by Dr Evans, Becka's professor/advisor/mentor, she is able to snag an interview for an internship with Oliver Weeks, CEO of Neuotova, a major food research corporation. But Becka is immediately thrown off her game when she first sets eyes on Oliver Weeks and is more than just a little attracted to him. She immediately feels the chemistry between them and is conflicted over her decision to seek a job with the handsome, charismatic CEO. And it seems Oliver Weeks may be attracted to her as well.  Oh my!Billionaire Oliver Weeks has worked long and hard to achieve his success. The only area in which he hasn't been successful is his personal life. He works hard but plays little and very seldom has time for a relationship with the fairer sex. Most of his dates are arranged by his personal assistant and never the same woman. He has no interest in love or developing feelings for anyone - until now. One look at Becka Jasper is all it takes for alpha male Oliver to know that he wants her and not just as an intern in his lab. She's not only beautiful but she's also brilliant. He wants her in his life as well as his bed and he's not accustomed to being told no. Oliver Weeks always gets what he wants and he wants Becka. Oh my! Will Oliver be able to convince Becka to accept his offer - both of them??? Hmm...I wonder???Book Two:Becka has accepted Oliver's requests for several dates and their chemistry is off the charts but she's still conflicted over accepting an internship with his company while having a personal relationship with the handsome CEO. She has little time to consider her dilemma when she's broadsided with some devastating news. Becka and Dr Evans have spent countless time and much effort on a special research project for Protame, a healthy replacement for the artificial sweetener Aspartame. Becka has worked tirelessly on this project and has also chosen it as the subject as her dissertation. The university has suffered budget cutbacks and as a result, they have lost funding for their project. Oh no! What will she do? Maybe she should tell Oliver. Will Oliver be able to help??? Oliver is more determined than ever to have the beautiful Becka in his bed and in his lab. And he's not above a little scheming and manipulation to get what he wants. But let's not forget, Becka has a mind of her own and may have a few surprises in store for the wealthy determined billionaire! It's a battle of wills and both are determined to get what they want but will it be each other??? Or are there other secrets and motivations at play? Hmm... I wonder???Book Three:Oliver weeks did indeed help the lovely Becka and donated the money anonymously to the University to fund her Protame project and of course he has his own selfish reasons. He wants Becka and if that means making her feel somewhat indebted to him, then so be it. He's certainly not above using every dirty trick in the book to get what he wants but he certainly never expected her proclamation of never mixing business with pleasure. She's refused to sleep with him if she accepts the position at Neuotova! Huh? Oh yes, she definitely laid the law down to him. But when had he ever allowed a little thing like an emphatic no to ever stop him from getting what he wants? Never! He'll do whatever it takes; he's determined to have the beautiful, intelligent Becka?Becka knows it was Oliver that donated the money but does finally agrees to accept the internship with Neuotova, but she has a caveat of her own. If she accepts the internship as a paid position, she will be unable continue her personal relationship with Oliver. What? Nope, her conscience won't allow it. She will not allow a personal relationship to compromise her work ethics. Or will she? While doing some research on Oliver and his company, Becka uncovers some very disturbing allegations against Oliver and his company Neuotova, allegations charging animal cruelty by the use use of animals in their research, experimentation and testing. Huh? Becka is a researcher after all so who better to investigate? Becka is invited by her advisor Dr Evans to teach a Food Science Ethics class and at her very first class she meets student Ethan Hernandez who makes some serious charges regarding the use of animal testing against Neuotova. But are they true or simply conjecture and who is Ethan Hernandez? There's only one way to discover the truth and if it means more research into company files, then that's a chance she's willing to take. She just hadn't expected a perfect opportunity to fall into her lap when Oliver offers her a job as his assistant and a two week working vacation to Italy. Huh? Oh my! Can she work so closely with him and still be objective? I think not!Book Four:Apparently, Becka can't remain objective, not when Oliver insists on whisking her away to Italy for a working vacation with lots of shopping, romantic dinners and lots and lots of dreamy sex. Oh my! But nothing can last forever and so they must return home to their lives which for Becka includes discovering the truth about Oliver. Becka has received an email from Ethan promising absolute proof of his accusations against Oliver. Becka  reveals this information to Oliver but she now must decide whether to meet with Ethan. But Ethan has decided to turn up the heat, not only in his effort to turn Becka against Oliver but also to pursue her for himself as well. What? Becka is now caught in the middle of the two powerful men and has no idea which one to believe. And the latest revelation from Oliver about Ethan has her even more confused! Talk about dropping a bomb! Oh my glory! I never saw that one coming! So, what's a girl to do when two handsome, wealthy men are both supposedly vying for her affection? Sleep with one and kiss the other??? Oh my!Book Five:After agreeing to a meeting with Ethan and sharing a mind-blowing kiss with him, Becka comes to the sudden realization that she's actually attracted to both handsome men but how is that even possible? How can she be attracted to both Oliver and Ethan when obviously one of the men is lying to her? But who is lying and who is telling the truth? If she's to believe the documents Ethan has shown her, then Oliver is paying Ethan to guarantee his silence, therefore Oliver is not being honest. Or Ethan is blackmailing Oliver and extorting money but for what reason? Documents can be forged, right? Oliver has become an important part of her life but just what is her relationship with him? Does he truly care about her and her welfare? Is she is his girlfriend or merely flavor of the month? And to further complicate the situation, it now seems that Ethan wants Becka for himself and intends to steal her away from Oliver. Oh my! Ethan doesn't give Becka long to contemplate her questions. The morning after their impromptu kiss, Ethan unexpectedly arrives at Neuotova demanding to see Oliver and then..... immediately envelops her in his arms and crushes her with a hot smoldering kiss just as Oliver is opening his office door! OMG! Oliver goes ballistic and Ethan retaliates. Allegations, threats and insults are hurled by each and it seems they may come to blows. What a nightmare! (Or is it? Hmm...What woman doesn't want two hot as heck billionaires fighting over her? But is it really her they're fighting over?) Apparently both men have been less than forthright with Becka. Each has lied to her and kept a shocking secret. But Oliver just let the cat out of the bag! Oh my goodness! Oliver is determined to keep Becka no matter the cost but that Ethan is such a devilishly naughty boy! After all, what's a little deceit, betrayal, blackmail and extortion among ......I'll still never tell!Book Six:After discovering the secret of Oliver and Ethan's relationship, Becka is determined to leave her troubles behind, at least for the weekend. She needs time to think and that means time away from both Oliver and Ethan. She and Lisa, her best friend and roommate, take a break to have a little fun but Becka's merrymaking is constantly interrupted by thoughts of Oliver. After a wild night partying, Becka tries to contact Oliver but his phone is answered by none other than Ethan! Ethan? Oh my goodness! And when Becka demands to know what's going on, Ethan refuses to explain, insisting that if she wants to know, she must immediately come to Oliver's home. What the heck? Why is Ethan at Oliver's home and where is Oliver? Surely Ethan would never harm Oliver, would he? After all, they are former business partners and ....... Nope, I'll still never tell! But I will say this....Ethan has certainly stepped up his game! Oh my! No spoilers from me but I will say this....Buckle up and hang on! It's one heck of a great ride! Beautiful intelligent grad student with a mind of her own-check! Handsome alpha male billionaire who refuses to take no for an answer-check! Wealthy, charismatic accuser intent on destroying his ??????-check! No Spoilers! Lies, deceit, betrayal, blackmail, extortion and some very serious allegations accusing animal abuse, cruelty and experimentation-check! A little mystery, suspense and a few secrets-check!  Heated attraction, fiery passion, instant chemistry and steamy dreamy sex-you bet! That and a whole lot more! I can hardly wait for the next installment! Fabulous entertainment and an awesome read!

Title: Knights Protectors Volume One (Nibbled by the Vamp and Big Bad Vamp)Series: Knight ProtectorsDesignation: Volume One Bundle consisting of Standalone Novellas One and TwoAuthor: Celia KyleMy Rating: FIVE HOT ROCKIN' STARSCelia Kyle has dazzled her readers yet again with another spectacular fun-filled new series, The Knight Protectors. The Volume One compilation includes Nibbled by the Vamp and Big Bad Vamp, the first two books of the series. In this remarkable modern day parody of King Arthur's Knights of the Round Table, the knights are actually vampires protecting the city of Atlanta from evil supernatural forces including pixies and dark demi-gods. Yep, I said pixies. And they are not so cutesy and definitely not nice. Each individual story is a well written short standalone novella featuring a different vamp protector and his "fire" with its very own happy for now ending. Each story is filled to the brim with danger, drama, action, adventure, suspense, humor and romance. And did I mention dreamy sex?  Oh yeah, totally has that as well! Does anyone remember the Carly Simon golden oldie, Nobody does It Better? You know, the one that was a theme song for one of the James Bond movies? Well, as I was reading this book, that song kept replaying in my mind because believe me when I say, nobody does it better than Celia Kyle! These stories are fast-paced, easy to follow, outrageously funny, exceptionally well written, well edited and include a fabulous cast of hilariously engaging characters. The men are handsome, strong, protective alpha males or should I say vamps,  and their women are big, bold, brave and beautiful with a generous side of sass and snark. These stories have it all! I love it! Fabulous entertainment and a rollicking good time for all! Rock on Celia Kyle! We want more!

ABSOLUTELY DELIGHTFUL !!!Title: VultureAuthor: Emilia BeaumontDesignation: A Stepbrother Romance Standalone NovelMy Rating: FIVE DELIGHTFUL STARS*****Wow! Emilia Beaumont has dazzled us yet again with another deeply emotional and truly moving stepbrother romance. After reading the title and blurb for the book, I expected a very rough and tumble story with characters you love to hate but what I read was something completely different and totally unexpected. I was utterly captivated from page one all the way to the very last page. I admit, I almost had a heart attack when I read "The End" and thought the book had ended a little prematurely but was happily rewarded when I turned the page and found the epilogue. Whew! That was a relief! We did get our happy ending! The story is powerful, emotional, compelling and romantic. The narrative is exceptionally well written in the first person with alternating his and her points of view. The dialogue is smart, easy, natural, well executed and flows effortlessly. But the true stars of this novel are the remarkable characters. They are captivating, intriguing, engaging, well crafted and are quite simply, the very heart and soul of the entire story. I immediately fell in love with all the characters and became completely vested in their futures and their quest for happiness. Even the "bad guys" of the story were noteworthy. If an author can make me forget that I'm reading fiction and convince me to hate a character in their book, then they've done an exceptional job. Maybe hate is a strong word but believe me when I say, I strongly disliked Sara's husband, Eric Chambers and her twin sister Anita. Beaumont skillfully combines all these elements into a deeply meaningful and delightfully entertaining contemporary stepbrother romance with a twist. I absolutely loved the interaction between Sara and Harvey. It was so much fun to watch the building of a real friendship between the two protagonists. It was an absolute delight to watch their gradual blossoming love for each other with each of them being afraid to venture into unknown territory and risk their heart. This novel begins as a slow sensual burn and gradually builds to a roaring red hot blaze! This book also contains a few unexpected developments along the way and some very pleasant surprises as well! I love it!Thirty two year old Sara Chambers is completely crushed when her husband Eric is killed in an automobile accident. Her feelings stem not so much from his death but from her fear of being alone and having to suddenly fend for herself. Her actual feeling over his death could only be described as one of relief - she is relieved knowing the physical and emotional abuse she has suffered for the  three years of their marriage had come to an end. Her nightmare is finally over. Never during the entire three years  had Eric ever allowed her to have a life other than one caring for him and their home. He wanted to be the sole breadwinner and he felt her place was at home waiting for him yet Eric never seemed happy or satisfied with her or anything she did. After their wedding, Eric changed from a loving, caring fiance to a hateful, volatile tyrant. Sara became completely and totally isolated from her family and friends. So now, she has no idea what to do and has no one to whom she can turn for guidance - until her handsome stepbrother, Harvey Guyer, barrels into her life and comes to her rescue. After her mother dies unexpectedly a few months later, Sara literally shuts down from the emotional stress and shock of losing another family member but Harvey seems even more determined to help her through her grief. In addition to being her stepbrother, Harvey has also become her best friend but Sara is having very inappropriate thoughts about her stepbrother. This is so not good! Her totally hot stepbrother would never want a plain-jane like her - would he??? Could her life get any worse??? Oh, yes it can!Successful, charismatic businessman, Harvey Guyer has the reputation for being quite the ladies' man. He could have any woman he desires but he's looking for the perfect woman - a woman like his perfectly imperfect stepsister, Sara Chambers. And fortunately for Harvey, she's now a widow and even more fortunate - she's technically no longer his stepsister! Game on!

Title: Secrets and LiesSeries: The Diamond ClubDesignation: Book Four of a Multi-Installment Serial, NOT a Standalone,Author: Ellie Danes and Lily KnightReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: FOUR SEXY STARS *****The Diamond Club: Secrets and Lies is the latest fabulous series from two of my favorite new authors, Ellie Danes and Lily Knight. This is my first time reading a collaboration between these two very gifted authors but mixing their unique blend of talents makes this series even more appealing. Please be advised, this is multi-installment serial and NOT a standalone read. Each installment contains 30 to 40 pages and does end with a cliffhanger. If you haven't read the previous books in the series, PLEASE STOP HERE. I realize this may not be everyone's cup of tea, but what can I say - I love a great serial. They're always a quick read and I get lots of variety since it enables me to read more stories; plus, I do love a great cliffhanger! The story is original, unique, realistic, fast-paced, exciting and seductive. The narrative is well written in the first person with his and her points of view. The dialogue is smart, snappy, well executed and flows naturally. The characters are captivating, intriguing, engaging, sexy and relatable. I immediately fell in love with the male and female protagonist of the story and quickly became completely vested in the lives of both characters. However, there was one little thing that subverted my attention from the story. After reading the blurb on both Amazon and Goodreads, the lead characters were introduced as Ryan Jensen and Alicia Brennan. The female protagonist of the story introduced herself as Alicia Valerio. At no point in the story could I find a reference to Alicia Brennan. That's a big turn-off for me personally. Therefore, I felt it necessary to subtract a star from the rating. Other than that, I found the book to be well developed, well written, well edited, moves at a quick but comfortable pace and is very pleasurable to read. This is multi-installment serial and NOT a standalone read. If you haven't read the previous books in the series, please STOP here.Book One:Twenty-six year old waitress and aspiring author, Alicia Valerio is having a typical day working at Afternoon Delight, a local, upscale, beach side bistro and neighborhood landmark - or was until handsome, charismatic, billionaire Ryan Jensen walks in and is seated in her section. Now it seems she's all thumbs and has two left feet. So, Alicia is more than just a little surprised when he introduces himself and after only a short conversation, a few choice curse words and a very unpleasant accident resulting in Ryan being soaked with his own beer, he asks her for a date - for today. That's right! He wants her to take off work and be his date for a small party on his boat which turns out to be a yacht! Oh my! And, the icing on the cake - he offers to pay her a thousand dollars for her to be his plus one. Huh? Surely, this handsome guy can get anyone he wants. If there is a catch, Alicia doesn't care as long as she gets paid! She's had her degree for three years but still working at Afternoon Delight while waiting for her writing career to take-off so she can publish her great debut novel. Nothing wrong with dreaming, right? Needless to say, she can use all the money she can get at this point. It takes everything she makes just to survive living on her own. What's a girl to do? Why accept, of course!Billionaire Bachelor Ryan Jensen has it all. Wealth, charm and good looks. Well, he almost has it all. What he doesn't have is a date for the party he's hosting this afternoon and evening on his yacht. The blind date arranged by his business partner just called and cancelled. That is so not cool! He hasn't had a steady girlfriend since he had been dumped a few years ago by Isabella for one of his business competitors. Apparently his friends had never really liked her and had seen her for the opportunist she really was. So, what's a handsome billionaire to do when he needs a date for his own party? Why ask his beautiful, smokin' hot waitress of course! Yeah, that one - the one that just spilled beer in his lap. But, will she be his plus one and agree to keep their payment terms a secret? We'll see!Book Two:Yes, Alicia does agree to be Ryan's plus one for the party on his yacht for $1000.00. The party went well and his date with Alicia after everyone returns to his home was spectacular. Ryan has never been as attracted to a women as he is to Alicia. Even his friends seemed to really like her and that is a must if he wants to be involved with her. Unfortunately, a drunken Reena, one of the members of his group, let the cat out of the bag about their "club" and now Alicia wants to know what the "club" is all about. While in college, Ryan, Justin, Roger and Dylan formed their own exclusive, secret club. They called it the Diamond Club. Originally, it was just the guys seeking more than just simple fun; they wanted to experience wild, heart-pounding adventure with thrills, chills and life-threatening, death-defying activities. It gave them a high like nothing else. They had become adrenaline junkies in need of extreme danger for a fix. But as time passed, the guys eventually agreed to add their girlfriends, Tammy, Lori and Reena. Fortunately, Ryan's former girlfriend, Isabella, had never been invited to join the club. Apparently everyone but Ryan had seen her for the opportunist she turned out to be. The guys all contribute equally to the club for their trips and expenses and the women have to have their own money to kick in for their entertainment and shopping which has never been a problem until now - until Alicia. Everyone else has money to burn and the rule is that the guys cannot pay for their girlfriends, but obviously Alicia doesn't have the kind of money needed to be a member of The Diamond Club. It was only supposed to be a one and done deal with Alicia but he can't stop thinking about her. Everything reminds him of Alicia and his thoughts seems to always somehow revert back to her. And with a very drunk Reena having let it slip about their club, he will either have to continue to lie to Alicia if he wants to continue seeing her or he could tell her the truth and still risk losing her. She may be just a waitress he met randomly but he really likes her. Everything about her appeals to him - not just her hot body but also her personality, her style and her confidence. She's the whole package and totally unlike anyone he's ever dated. But liking her isn't the problem. It's how well she can get along with his friends in the club, especially the women. There's also the little fact that she doesn't have access to the funds required to be a member of the club. And of course, the little matter of offering to pay her for their first date is something he would never want his friends to discover. What would they think of her then? Could she fit in with his friends? Would she even want to once he tells her the truth? What's a guy do do?Alicia dreams of becoming a successful author but her agent has shot down every suggestion she's submitted for publication and her first two book attempts were rejected by every publisher she contacted. She's completely run out of ideas but while updating the blog she started online five years ago, Waiting In My Tower, she suddenly has a thought. What if she writes an article for her blog about her surreal experience meeting Ryan and his friends. It could be essentially a blog within a blog and she could name it The Diamond Club Diaries. If by some chance they continue to see each other, she could do a weekly update all about the lives of the rich and famous and how they spend their money and their time. She would change all the names, of course, but still, it just might attract more readers and traffic to her blog which in turn would generate enough attention that may lead to a legitimate job offer as a writer. Besides, Ryan and his friends would never read her blog, would they? Hmm... Sounds like a disaster waiting to happen to me! So, with her decision made, she would continue to see Ryan but only if he reveals the truth about the club. But will he want to continue to see her? After all, she's not wealthy; she's just an ordinary, everyday waitress. Hmm...I wonder?Book Three:Yes, it seems Ryan does want the lovely Alicia. In fact, he wants her so much that he's willing to reveal all the juicy details about the Diamond Club. He's even invited her to go with the group on a white water rafting trip this weekend but Alicia has her doubts about wanting to belong to this group of billionaire boys with their toys and their "mean girl" wealthy girlfriends. How could a girl who waits tables ever fit in with Ryan and his friends? But she really likes Ryan and decides to give a try. Besides, if it doesn't work out, she will at least have some extra cash and a great story out of the deal. No harm, no foul, right? But is that all Alicia really wants? Unfortunately, Ryan's friends don't make it easy for Alicia and the girls bring out the claws, especially one in particular. For some reason, Tammy seems to know more than she pretends and is determined to turn everyone against Alicia and destroy any hope of her having a relationship with Ryan. What is this girl's problem? The outcome of the weekend may very well determine whether Ryan and Alicia have any hope of a future together but Ryan finally begins to see just how dysfunctional he and his friends have become but is it too little, too late? Will his realization come in time to save his possible future with Alicia?Book Four:Although the whitewater rafting weekend outing may have been a failure for Alicia's relationship with the women of the club, it seems to be very much a success for the relationship developing between her and Ryan. Alicia has continued her blog posts for her Diamond Club Diaries and it has begun to generate a lot of attention. More and more people have begun to leave positive comments and her shares have been growing exponentially with even her agent weighing in with glowing feedback. With a little luck, she just may become the latest blogging phenomenon! And that could very well mean job offers as a writer and possibly even a book deal! That would be a good thing, right? It could very well jump-start her career. Oh my! But it may also destroy her relationship with Ryan! Oh no! But she never used real names in her blog so no one would ever know the truth, right? Unless Tammy discovers her blog.....but that could never happen, right??? Wrong! What's a girl to do???After a group date turns into a disaster at a local club as a result of Justin trying to force his attentions on Alicia, Ryan comes to the realization that somewhere during the pretense with Alicia, he has begun to have real feelings for her. When he discovered Justin trying to seduce Alicia, it made him see red! He wanted to kill Justin! He loves Alicia but does she care for him as well? Or is she only dating him for the money? After Tammy's recent declaration that she knows Ryan is paying Alicia to be his girlfriend just like he did in college, Ryan has become even more concerned that someone may discover the truth and if this were to ever become public, it would surely destroy him and his company, Solas Enterprises. In a few weeks, he's hosting a huge gala to hopefully attract more investors and possibly another business partner. He can't afford any bad press, especially concerning the Diamond Club and his personal life with Alicia. Obviously, no woman would ever want to be publicly outed as a prostitute so Ryan feels safe in assuming that Alicia would never disclose their secret. Would she??? Oh my goodness! The crap just hit the fan!Beautiful aspiring writer working as a waitress-check! Handsome billionaire in need of a date-check! A yacht, a party, a secret club, a blog, a mean girl, betrayal, a few secrets and lies-check! Instant attraction, explosive chemistry and seductive romance-you bet! That and a whole lot more! Fabulous entertainment and an awesome read!

Title: Scaling Her DragonSeries: Paranormal Dating AgencyDesignation: Book Eight of Series, Stand-alone Novella, No CliffhangerAuthor: Milly TaidenMy Rating: FIVE DELICIOUSLY CUTE STARS*****Wow! Milly Taiden has knocked it out of the park - again with Scaling the Dragon, the latest fun-filled release in her best-selling Paranormal Dating Agency Series! Taiden once again demonstrates her exceptional talent and incredible skill by delivering another deliciously cute and delightfully entertaining paranormal tale filled to the brim with fun, humor, adventure and sweet romance. The story is cute, fast-paced, easy to follow, imaginative and humorous. The narrative is exceptionally well written in the third person with alternating his and her points of view. The dialogue is smart, sassy, well executed and flows effortlessly. The entire book is well crafted, well developed and well edited. It's always such a pleasure to read a Milly Taiden novel. But it's the characters that are always my favorite element of a Milly Taiden story. They are captivating, engaging, sexy  and endearing. The chemistry between our two protagonists is dynamic and passionate. In other words, sparks fly and passions blaze! Oh my! Buckle up my lovelies! It's another wild ride on Planet Aurora!Our saucy matchmaker, Gerri Wilder, is back on the planet Aurora to help another client find his mate.  Unfortunately, Gerri may have bitten off more than she can chew with Vikter Dragos, ruler of Dragosland.  Some time ago, Vikter contacted Gerri requesting help in finding his mate but sadly he has now run out of time. He is already losing his connection with his dragon.  His dragon is dying and soon, so will he.  He has given up all hope and has accepted his fate.  Without his mate, there is nothing  that can save him.  Or is there?Big, bold and beautiful Becca has moved to the planet Aurora to be with her only sister, Charlotte, who has recently mated two handsome wolf-shifters. Yes, two - some girls have all the luck.  She's happy with her body but sadly, the men on earth don't appreciate her curves. Maybe she could find someone on Aurora like her sister. Maybe even a dragon??? Becca would happily settle for just one hot shifter but some things are not meant to be. Or are they? Never fear, Becca dear! Gerri Wilder is on the case and does she have a surprise in store for both you and one very grumpy dragon! Handsome clueless dragon shifter in desperate need of his mate-check! Beautiful, sassy, curvy human in desperate need of love-check! One talented, stubborn and very determined matchmaker-check! Lots of fun, loads of humor, a little heartache, some very sweet romance and a dollop of steamy dreamy sex-you bet! That and a whole lot more! Fabulous entertainment and an awesome read!

Title: Dark Alpha Complete Box SetSeries: Dark AlphaDesignation: Volumes One through Six, Standalone NovelAuthor: Alisa WoodsReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: FIVE GLORIOUS STARS *****WOW! Like really, really WOW! This is my very first time reading anything written by Alisa Woods but it certainly won't be my last. When I started reading this book last night, I had no idea what to expect but I can honestly say that I never dreamed it would be so completely captivating. This saga is, without a doubt, one of the most touching love stories I've ever read. It is an exquisitely written tale, rich in gut-wrenching emotion and steeped with raw unbridled passion, expertly crafted and skillfully executed by an author who is quite obviously a master of her trade. The story was exciting, fast-paced, easy to follow, sweet, heartwarming, heartbreaking, romantic and sensual. The narrative was exceptionally well written in the third person with alternating his and her points of view from the male and female protagonists of the story. The dialogue was smart, realistic and flowed effortlessly. But the characters, well, they are the very heart and soul of this heart-stopping tale. They are fascinating, captivating, intriguing, engaging, sexy and well developed. My heart bled for the hero and heroine while my hatred burned against the villain. I sobbed uncontrollably, screamed and railed against injustice, then cheered and hoped for love to somehow prevail against evil. It left me completely breathless! It was absolutely magnificent!Wolf-shifter Jak Roberts may only be a beta but that doesn't stop him from longing for a love he can never hope to have. He has fallen in love with another wolf's mate and even worse, the woman he loves is the wife of his alpha's brother, Mace Crittenden. His can only ever be an unrequited love for the beautiful she-wolf, Arianna Stefan, who was kidnapped from her family by the vile, dark alpha wolf and is being held captive by a forced mating. Although Jak owes no loyalty to Mace, he does owe a debt to his brother, Gage Crittenden, the man who saved him from death at the hands of Jak's own brothers. For the last eight years, every month on the full moon he has willingly pledged his fealty to his Alpha - until now. Armed only with love, conviction and the will to do what's right, his loyalty, strength and determination will be tested beyond the limits of endurance for any man or wolf. Can true love conquer evil??? Will right defeat might??? I wonder???Beautiful she-wolf Arianna Stefan has been kidnapped from her loving family and is being held captive by the cruel, dark alpha wolf, Mace Crittenden. Full blooded she-wolves are rare and are considered a prize for any alpha but Mace sees Arianna as a possession rather than a treasure to be valued and loved. For six months she has been abused and mated against her will. Arianna has lost all hope of ever being free - until now - until Jak Roberts. Will true love be enough to save these two star crossed lovers??? I wonder??? Handsome beta wolf-shifter who is more alpha than he realizes-check! Beautiful tortured she-wolf who has been forcibly mated by one wolf but is in love with another-check! A dark, evil alpha who is beyond redemption-check! Two sexy, dangerous witches who even surprised me-check! A wonderful cast of supporting characters-check! Danger, drama, kidnapping, abuse, betrayal, magic and heartbreaking angst-check! Heated attraction, fiery passion, sweet romance and dreamy sex-you bet! That and a whole lot more! Fabulous entertainment and an awesome read!

Title: Beauty and the Beast (The Erotic Tale)Designation: Adult Fairy Tale Romance  Standalone NovellaAuthor: Bailey CrissmanReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: THREE PROMISING STARSTo begin, I would like to say up front, if you're attempting to rewrite a great classic story and give it your own spin, then at least make sure that your book has been well edited before it's published. I will admit, I did like the general concept the author had for this book. It was an interesting new take on a very old tale but that's where my enjoyment stopped. The grammar was fair but the sentence structure, punctuation and formatting were atrocious and could easily have been corrected with a good edit. At times the story was disjointed and confusing with points of view sometimes changing in the same paragraph. The narrative was written in the third person but it was often difficult to ascertain who was speaking or thinking. I was constantly backtracking and rereading while trying to understand the story. Had I not already been familiar with the basic premise of the story, I probably would have stopped reading midway through the book. However, it did hold my interest; I was actually curious to see how the tale would play out and how it would actually end. And to the author's credit, she did a decent job of entertaining me despite the editing errors and actually treated me to a pleasant surprise at the end. I also liked the progression of character development for Belle, the female protagonist of the story. Her transformation from helpless maiden to kick-ass heroine was truly inspired. Would I recommend this book to a friend? Probably not but I would recommend an edit and then it would most likely be a great read. In this case, I don't think I need to explain to anyone what this story is about but I will say that the author did a fair job of putting her own unique signature twist on this age old classic. I would also like to mention that if any readers object to explicit violence and sex that starts out as non consensual, then this may not be the book for you. After all, this is an erotic fairy tale. I am not a reviewer that enjoys author bashing but instead, I always try to give recognition due to a writer for their imagination, effort and hard work. My Rating: THREE Promising Stars

Title: SinnedDesignation: A Priest Romance Standalone Novella, NO CliffhangerAuthor: Veronica DayeMy Rating: FIVE DIVINE STARS*****WOW! This is my very first time reading Veronica Daye's work but it certainly won't be my last!  Veronica Daye seems to certainly be "blessed" with an extraordinary gift as a master storyteller and in her latest sexy release, Sinned, she has demonstrated that she not only has an abundance of talent but knows how to use it and do it exceptionally well! I love it! This is a a very relaxing, enjoyable and easy to follow standalone novella which does include a wonderfully written happily-ever-after ending. The story is sweet, tender, sensual, arousing, captivating and totally held my attention. Once I started reading, I quickly became completely immersed in the story and I wanted more. The narrative is exceptionally well written in the first person with alternating his and her points of view given by the two protagonists of the story which I believe adds to the depth and complexity of the story and definitely gives us a better understanding of the characters, their feelings and motivations. The story is exceptionally well crafted with the reader being given an introduction to the present in the first chapter and then flashing back to six years earlier giving the complete sequence of events as they unfold which gently leads the reader back to the current events as they are now happening. The dialogue is smart, well executed, easy to follow and flows effortlessly. And now for the best part, the characters. They are captivating, intriguing, engaging, relatable, at times humorous and sexy as sin. The chemistry between the two lead characters is convincing and almost palpable. Quite simply, it is off the charts hot! I found myself actually cheering for these two unlikely lovers. Daye skillfully crafts these elements into a divinely entertaining contemporary romance with a twist. I would like to add, if you object to mature subject matter and explicit sexual situations then this is probably not the book for you, but if you love an exquisitely written forbidden romance with a sharp edge filled to the brim with passion, raw emotion, powerful characters, heartbreaking angst, steamy dreamy sex and a wonderfully written, heartwarming, happily-ever-after ending, then this is definitely the read for you!Twenty eight year old Charlie McArthur has devoted the last nine years of his life into becoming the man he is today - Father Charles McArthur - and the last five of which he has been completely celibate. He left temptation behind once he graduated college and has chosen to love all mankind and to serve only God and the Church. He is no longer tempted by the pleasures of the flesh. He has taken his vows and has not once regretted his decision - until now.  After traveling to work in a remote area in Peru, Father Charles finally discovers how it truly feels to love another as much as he loves the church. But will his faith be strong enough to resist the beautiful Ava Abrams? Does he even want to resist?Twenty five year old Ava Abrams is a doctor working in a remote area of Peru with Doctors Without Borders. She was home schooled throughout her entire childhood and as a result, has found it difficult to make friends or maintain any sort of personal relationships. She's never really felt the need nor the desire until now - until she meets Charles McArthur, the charming young priest who has just arrived in the village where her clinic is located. Ava was raised a Catholic but has never been particularly religious herself. She knows the thoughts and feelings she has for Father Charles are definitely sinful. Oh my! He is one delicious hottie with gorgeous blue eyes and a body to die for - not literally, of course. But her sinful thoughts don't stop her from developing a friendship with the handsome young cleric. The problem only begins when she finds herself wanting so much more than just a casual friendship and the real dilemma begins when Father Charles appears to want more from her as well. Should she succumb to her desires and enjoy more than just a friendship with Father Charles? Will it just be a wonderful few months and nothing else? Or will the love felt by two lonely souls destroy both their lives and leave a permanent painful reminder in their hearts of how it feels to love, to have love and then lose love forever? Beautiful, intelligent and lonely doctor in search of acceptance and friendship-check! Handsome, kindhearted and dedicated priest trying to serve God and help the world-check! A sweet, tender, sensitively written forbidden love story with unexpected consequences-check! That and a whole lot more! Deliciously sweet, seriously sexy and delightfully entertaining! Well done Veronica Daye!Complimentary copy received in exchange for a review.

Title: Secrets and LiesSeries: The Diamond ClubDesignation: Book Three of a Multi-Installment Serial, Not a Standalone,Author: Ellie Danes and Lily KnightReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: FOUR SEXY STARS *****The Diamond Club: Secrets and Lies is the latest fabulous series from two of my favorite new authors, Ellie Danes and Lily Knight. This is my first time reading a collaboration between these two very gifted authors but mixing their unique blend of talents makes this series even more appealing. Please be advised, this is multi-installment serial and NOT a standalone read. Each installment contains 30 to 40 pages and does end with a cliffhanger. If you haven't read the previous books in the series, please STOP here. I realize this may not be everyone's cup of tea, but what can I say - I love a great serial. They're always a quick read and I get lots of variety since it enables me to read more stories; plus, I do love a great cliffhanger! The story is original, unique, realistic, fast-paced, exciting and seductive. The narrative is well written in the first person with his and her points of view. The dialogue is smart, snappy, well executed and flows naturally. The characters are captivating, intriguing, engaging, sexy and relatable. Unfortunately, there was one little thing that subverted my attention from the story. After reading the blurb on both Amazon and Goodreads, the lead characters were introduced as Ryan Jensen and Alicia Brennan. The female protagonist of the story introduced herself as Alicia Valerio. At no point in the story could I find a reference to Alicia Brennan. That's a big turn-off for me personally. Therefore, I felt it necessary to subtract a star from the rating. Other than that, I found the book to be well developed, well written, well edited, moves at a quick but comfortable pace and is very pleasurable to read. This is multi-installment serial and NOT a standalone read. If you haven't read the previous books in the series, please STOP here.Book One:Twenty-six year old waitress and aspiring author, Alicia Valerio is having a typical day working at Afternoon Delight, a local, upscale, beach side bistro and neighborhood landmark - or was until handsome, charismatic, billionaire Ryan Jensen walks in and is seated in her section. Now it seems she's all thumbs and has two left feet. So, Alicia is more than just a little surprised when he introduces himself and after only a short conversation, a few choice curse words and a very unpleasant accident resulting in Ryan being soaked with his own beer, he asks her for a date - for today. That's right! He wants her to take off work and be his date for a small party on his boat which turns out to be a yacht! Oh my! And, the icing on the cake - he offers to pay her a thousand dollars for her to be his plus one. Huh? Surely, this handsome guy can get anyone he wants. If there is a catch, Alicia doesn't care as long as she gets paid! She's had her degree for three years but still working at Afternoon Delight while waiting for her writing career to take-off so she can publish her great debut novel. Nothing wrong with dreaming, right? Needless to say, she can use all the money she can get at this point. It takes everything she makes just to survive living on her own. What's a girl to do? Why accept, of course!Billionaire Bachelor Ryan Jensen has it all. Wealth, charm and good looks. Well, he almost has it all. What he doesn't have is a date for the party he's hosting this afternoon and evening on his yacht. The blind date arranged by his business partner just called and cancelled. That is so not cool! He hasn't had a steady girlfriend since he had been dumped a few years ago by Isabella for one of his business competitors. Apparently his friends had never really liked her and had seen her for the opportunist she really was. So, what's a handsome billionaire to do when he needs a date for his own party? Why ask his beautiful, smokin' hot waitress of course! Yeah, that one - the one that just spilled beer in his lap. But, will she be his plus one and agree to keep their payment terms a secret? We'll see!Book Two:Yes, Alicia does agree to be Ryan's plus one for the party on his yacht for $1000.00. The party went well and his date with Alicia after everyone returns to his home was spectacular. Ryan has never been as attracted to a women as he is to Alicia. Even his friends seemed to really like her and that is a must if he wants to be involved with her. Unfortunately, a drunken Reena, one of the members of his group, let the cat out of the bag about their "club" and now Alicia wants to know what the "club" is all about. While in college, Ryan, Justin, Roger and Dylan formed their own exclusive, secret club. They called it the Diamond Club. Originally, it was just the guys seeking more than just simple fun; they wanted to experience wild, heart-pounding adventure with thrills, chills and life-threatening, death-defying activities. It gave them a high like nothing else. They had become adrenaline junkies in need of extreme danger for a fix. But as time passed, the guys eventually agreed to add their girlfriends, Tammy, Lori and Reena. Fortunately, Ryan's former girlfriend, Isabella, had never been invited to join the club. Apparently everyone but Ryan had seen her for the opportunist she turned out to be. The guys all contribute equally to the club for their trips and expenses and the women have to have their own money to kick in for their entertainment and shopping which has never been a problem until now - until Alicia. Everyone else has money to burn and the rule is that the guys cannot pay for their girlfriends, but obviously Alicia doesn't have the kind of money needed to be a member of The Diamond Club. It was only supposed to be a one and done deal with Alicia but he can't stop thinking about her. Everything reminds him of Alicia and his thoughts seems to always somehow revert back to her. And with a very drunk Reena having let it slip about their club, he will either have to continue to lie to Alicia if he wants to continue seeing her or he could tell her the truth and still risk losing her. She may be just a waitress he met randomly but he really likes her. Everything about her appeals to him - not just her hot body but also her personality, her style and her confidence. She's the whole package and totally unlike anyone he's ever dated. But liking her isn't the problem. It's how well she can get along with his friends in the club, especially the women. There's also the little fact that she doesn't have access to the funds required to be a member of the club. And of course, the little matter of offering to pay her for their first date is something he would never want his friends to discover. What would they think of her then? Could she fit in with his friends? Would she even want to once he tells her the truth? What's a guy do do?Alicia dreams of becoming a successful author but her agent has shot down every suggestion she's submitted for publication and her first two book attempts were rejected by every publisher she contacted. She's completely run out of ideas but while updating the blog she started online five years ago, Waiting In My Tower, she suddenly has a thought. What if she writes an article for her blog about her surreal experience meeting Ryan and his friends. It could be essentially a blog within a blog and she could name it The Diamond Club Diaries. If by some chance they continue to see each other, she could do a weekly update all about the lives of the rich and famous and how they spend their money and their time. She would change all the names, of course, but still, it just might attract more readers and traffic to her blog which in turn would generate enough attention that may lead to a legitimate job offer as a writer. Besides, Ryan and his friends would never read her blog, would they? Hmm... Sounds like a disaster waiting to happen to me! So, with her decision made, she would continue to see Ryan but only if he reveals the truth about the club. But will he want to continue to see her? After all, she's not wealthy; she's just an ordinary, everyday waitress. Hmm...I wonder?Book Three:Yes, it seems Ryan does want the lovely Alicia. In fact, he wants her so much that he's willing to reveal all the juicy details about the Diamond Club. He's even invited her to go with the group on a white water rafting trip this weekend but Alicia has her doubts about wanting to belong to this group of billionaire boys with their toys and their "mean girl" wealthy girlfriends. How could a girl who waits tables ever fit in with Ryan and his friends? But she really likes Ryan and decides to give a try. Besides, if it doesn't work out, she will at least have some extra cash and a great story out of the deal. No harm, no foul, right? But is that all Alicia really wants? Unfortunately, Ryan's friends don't make it easy for Alicia and the girls bring out the claws, especially one in particular. For some reason, Tammy seems to know more than she pretends and is determined to turn everyone against Alicia and destroy any hope of her having a relationship with Ryan. What is this girl's problem? The outcome of the weekend may very well determine whether Ryan and Alicia have any hope of a future together but Ryan finally begins to see just how dysfunctional he and his friends have become but is it too little, too late? Will his realization come in time to save his possible future with Alicia?  Beautiful aspiring writer working as a waitress-check! Handsome billionaire in need of a date-check! A yacht, a party, a secret club, a blog, a mean girl and a few secrets and lies-check! Instant attraction, explosive chemistry and seductive romance-you bet! That and a whole lot more! Fabulous entertainment and an awesome read!

Title: Mate of the DragonSeries: Her Dragon's BaneDesignation: Book 6, Can Be Read As A Standalone, NO CliffhangerAuthor: Harmony RainesReading Platform: Kindle UnlimitedMy Rating: FIVE DELIGHTFULLY ENTERTAINING STARS*****I have been in love with the Her Dragon's Bane Series since Harmony Raines introduced the very first book, Soul of the Dragon. I have followed the series faithfully and have now read all six books and I can honestly say that I have loved each and every one. But, who doesn't love handsome, sexy dragons, right? We met Tara the Witch very early in the series and I have always been fascinated by her character. I'm just so excited because we finally get to read Tara's story and it was definitely worth the wait! Harmony Raines has saved the best for last; so buckle up my lovelies, it's a wild ride - literally! The story is exciting, original, well developed, romantic and full of suspense. The narrative is exceptionally well written in the third person with alternating his and her points of view which, in my opinion, always adds to the understanding of not only the story but the characters as well. The dialogue is well executed and flows effortlessly. Harmony Raines is a master storyteller and a true professional and as such, her books are always well crafted and well edited. The characters are fascinating, captivating, engaging and will capture your heart. Raines skillfully combines these elements into a delightfully entertaining paranormal tale filled to the brim with danger, adventure, suspense, magic, fantasy, romance and a generous measure of heartbreaking angst. This story proves once again why Harmony Raines is a true master of her trade.Dragon Lord Domhnall may very well be the greatest dragon to ever live but Tara is the most powerful witch in Spellholm, at least in her opinion. Yet she still is unable to get Domhnall to trust and accept her as his mate, They were fated to be together but Domhnall refuses to acknowlege her or their fate to be together and Tara is beginning to tire of his behavior. Maybe she should turn him into a toad! It would serve him right! But no, she would never do that no matter how tempting the thought. If she could truly become the most powerful witch, then she would certainly be considered a worthy mate and Domhnall would have to accept her. And that would take knowledge because knowledge is power. Tara may be a powerful Seer but unfortunately can never see her own future and no amount of power could ever help her to see her own destiny. She's so tired of being taken for granted. She would trade her very soul to win the love and respect of the great Dragon Lord. Of course, she may be partly to blame for his reluctance. She doesn't have the most congenial personality and at times, could be considered abrasive. She's just pathetic! She doesn't even like herself so how could anyone else. For now she would continue to be at Domhnall's beck and call and continue to only dream of spending her nights in the arms of the handsome Dragon Lord.Domhnall finds it hard to trust anyone, especially a witch after one stole his heart stone several centuries ago. Logically, he knows that Tara had nothing to do with the deception by the other witch but he still finds it hard to accept that she is is true mate. He may not trust her but that doesn't stop him from wanting her and he knows that she wants him as well.  The temptation to throw caution to the wind and take the beautiful witch is almost overpowering. He had succumbed to taking a kiss only once but could still remember her taste on his lips. It was glorious. But he could resist, couldn't he? But when faced with an opportunity to walk away from love and his mate, what will he choose? Can fate find a way to finally bring these two stubborn souls together? Hmm....I wonder??? Handsome, stubborn Dragon Lord-check! Beautiful, powerful and very independent witch-check! Fate, destiny and a little push from an outside force-check! Heated attraction, fiery passion, spicy romance and dreamy sex-you bet! That and a whole lot more! Fabulous entertainment and an awesome read! I believe this story can be read as a standalone although I would highly recommend reading the entire series. This story does include a wonderfully written happy ending. Woo-Hoo for Tara!

DELIGHTFULLY ENTERTAINING !!!Title: To Win A Mate: Somewhere. TexasSeries: VonBrandt FamilyDesignation: Book Three of Series, Standalone Novella, NO CliffhangerAuthor: Krystal ShannanMy Rating: FIVE DELIGHTFULLY ENTERTAINING STARS *****Krystal Shannan never fails to entertain her readers and her latest release is certainly no exception. To Win a Mate is the third story in her amazingly popular VonBrandt Series and as with the previous two books, it is a total page-turner. It captured my attention right out of the gate and held my interest until the very last page. What can I say? I'm a real sucker for a cowboy werewolf, especially when they're handsome and charming! And did I mention rich? Oh yes, all the VonBrandts are rolling in oil, lots and lots of "Texas Black Gold." Shannan is a wonderfully gifted storyteller who has woven an enthralling paranormal tale filled with adventure, fantasy, magic and romance. This release is quite a bit shorter than the other books in the series but is quite enjoyable nonetheless. It still packs quite a punch and you most definitely get your money's worth. The story is exciting, sweet, romantic, passionate and seductive. The narrative is exceptionally well written in the third person with his and her points of view. The dialogue is smart, well executed and flows seamlessly. The plot of this short story is primarily character driven with the hero and heroine taking center stage with a little assistance from a few new and familiar faces. And of course, we have a worthy antagonist whom everyone will love to hate. All of our primary characters are captivating, engaging, endearing and sexy. The male protagonist was both strong and sensitive while the heroine began somewhat timid but quickly found her courage and her voice which I liked very much. Shannan expertly combined these elements to craft an sweet, exciting, fun and fast-paced paranormal romance that will tug on your heartstrings. What didn't I like about this story? Not a darn thing!  However, having said that, I would have loved to have known so much more about each of our lead characters, especially Elise Blanchard and how she came to be an orphan. Hopefully, Ms Shannan will grace us with additional information in a future story.Werewolf Jared VonBrandt has a business degree from the Somewhere, Texas local college which could have gotten him a job anywhere in the world, especially with his family connections. Jared is only thirty-two, still young, yet he still prefers the solitude of the ranch and the woods - he is a werewolf after all - and of course, his job running the promotional department of VonBrandt Oil which at least gives him something to do occasionally. He loves being a werewolf. Being a wolf is as much a part of him as being human. His dream and only desire is to stay on the ranch, eventually find a mate and hopefully one day have a family. Unfortunately has has never experienced the pull of a true mate and no woman has ever even as much  piqued his or his wolf's interest - until now. But she lives in New Orleans! What's a wolf to do?Elise Blanchard has no clue as to what she really is. Once a month she turns into a wolf and doesn't understand why. In her twenty-seven years of life, she's never even met another person like herself or at least she doesn't think she has. How would she even know if she had? She has no clue about her parentage or ancestry. She was found as a baby and grew up in foster care, Now as an adult, she tries to hide in plain sight among the residents of New Orleans. But hiding isn't an option with her lecherous boss, Pier Nelson. Elise is an administrative assistant at TechCorp Industries and she has just been volunteered by her boss to participate in a charity auction as one of the prizes. She knows it's a setup by her boss and will probably turn out to be a huge disaster - until she senses someone - someone like her. And he's bidding on her! Oh my! Could it be possible that after twenty-seven years she has finally found someone like her - another person who could turn into a wolf ? She has so many questions but would he have the answers? She has long wished to know what she is, where she came from, anything about her family or her history. Could she trust this handsome, enigmatic stranger? Unfortunately, he would have to save her from her own boss before she could hope to discover any answers. Would he help her? Hmm...I wonder??? Beautiful female wolf trying to hide from the world with no idea of who or what she really is-check!
